votes.reason: A lot of money to run some random tick tock campaign

I am a huge fan of the Nouns News, however, for what is being made currently it seems the team is a bit bloated and the price seems to reflect that.

I also am not sure if 1M is that great of a metric on TikTok, with the TikTok creator fund when you hit 1M views as a creator you can make $20-$40, if the platform puts that low a price of value on those views why would we spend so much?

If the TikToks were more interactive and had more calls to action I may be in favor. I encourage you to revisit this if the prop does not pass.
glad to support funding this team to continue experimenting with new ways of getting more eyeballs on noggles. this is a worthwhile experiment to run even without the clickbaity headline challenge.
While I have concerns about the focus of this prop, I think the team could iterate and achieve some solid proliferation goals with the funding to focus and grow.

⌐◨-◨

(24 Yes, 31 No, 8 Abstain)

**samellis ⌐◨-◨**
I liked the quality of the Nouns News, both in content and quality, and the new stuff with a larger team and price, less so. 
I also am not sure if 1M is that great on TikTok, with their creator fund when you hit 1M views you can make $20-$40, if the platform puts that low a price of value on those views why would we spend so much?

**profwerder ⌐◨-◨ FloriNouns**
Unfortunately this is a no from me. I just don’t think the feedback was incorporated and the ask is too high
But I love nouns News and hope they continue!

$100 CPM without supporting market research and competitive analysis seems high (I'd expect $10 CPM + expenses). This proposal should lean heavily on audience targeting data available through TikTok's advertising platform. Would be delighted to consult on a revision of this prop and want to highlight that I love the team and know they're capable, but a more data driven approach would be ideal.

I like this team very much, and I think they have all done, can do and will do great things. Unfortunately, I cannot support this prop in its current form. Feedback was given from Nouncil and elsewhere about providing more clarity on metrics, potentially lowering total ask and focusing on building a nounish presence on TikTok, but I didn't see any of that feedback incorporated in the proposal that went on chain. I like and respect Leo a lot, and if this prop is not successful, I hope he and team will reach out to other nouners and nounish builders to find out how to better focus on the pieces of the machine that are working, and craft a proposal that really highlights these strengths.
NounsDAO votes on Props not people. We support this team in finding the right Prop to continue building on Nouns.

prop.description:
# Set proposal threshold

Currently we have a threshold in place which requires 2 nouns to put a proposal on chain. The intention of the threshold is to reduce spam. For the current size of nounsDAO it is not necessary. This is a built-in threshold which can be adjusted at any time with a proposal.

**Proposal to change the threshold from 2 nouns to 1 noun for putting a proposal on chain.**
This would allow any address with a minimum of **1 NOUN** to formally propose to the DAO, until the Noun supply reaches **1000**. After that the threshold will be set to 2 again.

This is an updated version of [Prop 134](https://nouns.wtf/vote/134).

votes.reason:
I feel like any Nouner should be able to propose to the rest of the protocol their idea on-chain and let the other nouners or delegates vote for or against it. 

If Nouners don’t want to give the proposals attention that is their business as they have deployed capital into it. 

Just having immediate access to one noun does not signal a bad idea, we can look at past proposals and see that is not the case.

Drop the threshold, invite ideas, and good ideas will rise to the top.
If people want to submit something but don't have two nouns, they can ask to be sponsored - this is something which has been very successful, in the past.
I think owning a single Noun should allow the ability to submit a proposal, for now at least. I like until Noun #1000 and think that’s a good time to revisit this. ⌐◨-◨

After careful consideration, we believe this is very #ugly

Proposals will have to be produced at a higher level as the Discord closes and this is a natural way to allow the community to expedite the process of figuring out quality vs. quantity for on-chain props <3

⌐◨-◨: Nouncil votes No

(22 Yes, 35 No, 5 Abstain)

Discussion from Nouncil Discord 
https://discord.gg/nouncil

**JoshuaFisher**
I’m fine with this but also Like the barrier being 2 because it is a self selecting benefit in terms of how much time do they spend in the community. If you can’t get 2 Nouns then maybe not ready to go on-chain imho.

**JoelCares**
A 1 Noun threshold to submit proposals for the first 1000 Nouns feel reasonable to me.

**andreitr**
The existing threshold is a feature that reduces noise.

**fiveoceans_dev**
I also, agree to keep the threshold growing. It will make smaller stake holders to work together and in turn help coordinate against potential malicious activities by individual big stake holders

**kerimbonia**
Also in agreement that lowering the threshold will introduce more noise and with all the changes going on in the nouns ecosystem i'm not sure this is the best time for it.

**mintface.eth**
I lean towards a single Noun so that proposals get seen and evaluated. 
2 Nouns min creates a three party negotiation to take something on-chain. Two parties are then seen to 'endorse' or at a min be associated with proposer.
The idea of acquire a Noun and propose is cool.

**CHEFFO ⌐◧-◧**
i think that the current system is healthy and not needing a change

**samellis ⌐◨-◨**
Drop the threshold, good ideas will rise, especially with the changes of gas reimbursement and the more than likely time extension, why put an additional “pay to play” barrier. Let folks come in with their ideas.

**Benbodhi**
Only just over a year until it would increase again.
The barrier to entry to buy a noun is significant and the ability to submit a prop after purchasing a noun is something I feel should be possible.
I know delegation and sponsorship is a thing, but I’m thinking of lone actors.
Not sure it makes a huge difference in prop quality.

**Toady_Hawk**
I agree with reducing to one noun threshold. We don’t have a proposal spam problem yet (which is why this feature was baked in) so I think it makes sense to lower it to encourage more participation. Last time this was proposed (with a long time period attached that muddied the waters) it was all the brand new Nouners voting yes, which I think was telling. Keep in mind if spam ever became a problem, another proposal could easily raise the threshold again.

**lil bk**
all in favor of reducing the threshold to propose. entry of barrier to hold a noun is high as is. 

there’s a total of 292 unique noun owners and thus don’t think spam would be an issue. instead, it’ll increase the overall probability to proliferate/propose in the first place. if my counting is correct, there theoretically is only 58 people who can propose as it stands (holding 2 nouns)

**kerimbonia**
i'm on the fence with this one but starting to lean towards yes the more we chat about it. 
i def agree that anybody buying a noun should be able to put a proposal on-chain and that the cream of proposals will always rise to the top... that might sway my vote (no) concerning added noise to proposals and the additional time investment needed for voters/nouncil to discuss and filter through all of those to give each one the attention they deserve to get. i also think there is something very community about somebody with a noun having to reach out to another to get a proposal on-chain... anyways, still thinking about all this.
likely means more proposals. which in turn mean more on-chain data to learn from. especially since _nuking discord_ has already resulted in more reasoning on-chain.

Last time this type of proposal was made, except with an exaggerated time hook that ultimately distracted from the purpose of the prop, it was defeated... but I saw all brand new nouners voting Yes. In my opinion, that means that the 2 noun minimum is probably unnecessarily disenfranchising people who want to be active in the DAO. We don't yet have a problem with spam, and noun ownership is still a lofty bar (nobody is spending 50 ETH for the lulz), so I support lowering the threshold to 1 noun for now. This can always be revisited in future, if and when an over-concentration of low quality proposals becomes a problem. 

I think it is much more likely that a good proposal will not make it on chain due to the threshold being 2, than a bad prop will make it on chain because the threshold is only 1.
We are not overflowing with proposals to justify excluding so many nouners from putting up props.

I think keeping the bar lower temporarily is a good idea, even more so now that the community will "fragment" into smaller subcommunities and it will naturally be a bit harder to find someone to help you put a prop on chain.
can always vote to adjust again if things really start bussin

Although I generally support reducing friction for builders, I don't believe that temporarily lowering the quorum is the correct approach. If nouns proliferate well and maintain the current price, we'll run into the exact same problem later.

Although well-intentioned, this only kicks the can down the road, where we should be looking for alternative solutions like autonomous proposals à la Compound / Uniswap.
it's not clear from this proposal that this is a problem that needs solving. i'm in favor of keeping the threshold as-is until there's a compelling reason to change it.

prop.description:
# Set Voting Period to 5 days

As the number of nouners and nouns sub-communities increase, we will see more proposals appear on-chain without prior off-chain coordination. This is a proposal to increase the 'Voting Period' (from the current 3 days) to 5 days, so that nouners have more time to diligence proposals and to decide how they will vote.

The 'Voting Delay' is currently 2 days and is not changed by this proposal. If this proposal passes, it will take ~1 week between proposal submission and the conclusion of voting.

# Set Voting Period to 5 days and Voting Delay to 2 days

As the number of nouners and nouns sub-communities increase, we will see more proposals appear on-chain without prior off-chain coordination. 

This is a proposal to: 
- set 'Voting Delay' to be 2 days. This is a minor change that accounts for block times changing to 12 seconds after the merge.
- set 'Voting Period' to 5 days, so that nouners have more time to diligence proposals and to decide how they will vote.

votes.reason:
As we move from one discord to many discords and this has added time to hunt down and discuss the proposals extending the time for props to go on-chain and get voted on makes more sense. 

This also may alleviate future pressure points if we have an influx of on-chain proposals that need review before we vote on them. 

I am happy to support this proposal.
Makes sense to do this ⌐◨-◨
Much needed and Ugly af!

⌐◨-◨

Nouncil votes FOR Prop 161.

(64 Yes, 2 No, 1 Abstain)

**Discussion from Nouncil Discord:**
https://discord.gg/nouncil

**JoelCares**
Strong yes from me. I would like to increase both of these values further, but am ok with this in the interim.
 
Voting Delay + Voting Period needs to be at least 7 days combined in order to guarantee each prop will be discussed on various subdao weekly meetings.
will price, brill, nice.
ez clap

prop.description:
# Nouns Fair @ ETHSanFrancisco

## TD;DR
NounsDAOAmigos was invited by ETHGlobal to make the third edition of the Nouns Fair at ETHSanFrancisco this Nov 4-6, 2022. We are asking for 23.25 ETH.

## Context
We are NounsDAO Amigos. We are building a Spanish-speakers community for LatAm and beyond. We’ve been proliferating the ⌐◨-◨ adding some spice and a pinch of Ñs.

We recently hosted the second edition of the Nouns Fair. An IRL fun experience aimed to proliferate Nouns at the ETHBogota hackathon. We’ve confirmed the importance of this kind of event that helps increase awareness of the DAO, onboard potential builders, and put noggles in the eyes of hundreds.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qe1R5WFT9_E](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qe1R5WFT9_E)

More detailed info can be found here - [https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/nsfw-nouns-fair-ethbogota/2326](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/nsfw-nouns-fair-ethbogota/2326) & [https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/nsfw-nouns-fair-ethbogota/2326/7?u=mono](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/nsfw-nouns-fair-ethbogota/2326/7?u=mono)

## Nouns Fair @ETHSanFrancisco
Given the success of the Nouns Fair in Colombia, **the ETHGlobal team invited NounsDAOAmigos to make a new edition, this time at ETHSanFrancisco!** We believe it’s important to keep having a presence at IRL events like this. As we saw in Mexico and Colombia, this is a great environment for spreading the ⌐◨-◨ and growing our Spanish-speaker community.

**Goals**
- Make a new amigo, San Francisco
- Onboard potential contributors
- Put Nouns in the eyes of hundreds of builders

**Details**

Place: San Francisco, California
Venue: Palace of Fine Arts
Dates: November 4 - 6, 2022
Team: NounsDAOAmigos

The Nouns Fair will be a 3-day cultural experience focused on builders where they will be able to engage with others and learn about Nouns. This activation will be a localized nounish experience with photo opportunities, games, merchandise, and an NFT gallery. The proliferation of culture á la nounish. The following are examples of what happened in Bogotá and what we’ll create for San Francisco with a different flavor:

**Photo-opportunity & noggles**
A fully Nouns-branded photo station where attendees can take selfies and full-body photos will serve as a welcoming station. We want to create a photo set where people can feel nounish and share it on the internet. Of course, physical noggles are key.
![](https://i.imgur.com/XGMsKWG.jpg)
![](https://i.imgur.com/i9Ww7cU.jpg)
![](https://i.imgur.com/W9LifGd.jpg)



**Games**
Two different games will be available at the place: **foosball**, and **a traditional local game**. We believe these games have a nounish feeling and will serve as an engagement factor.
![](https://i.imgur.com/14ONVu1.jpg)



**Merchandise**
Pins, stickers, and T-shirts will be distributed as rewards for spending time and engaging with the Nouns Fair by playing games and taking photos.
![](https://i.imgur.com/TEqCnbF.jpg)
![](https://i.imgur.com/exzjPyD.jpg)



**NFT gallery**
A 5 screens NFT gallery representing local artists and some nounish representatives.
![](https://i.imgur.com/SvvfxNS.jpg)
![](https://i.imgur.com/iCu328D.jpg)


**Costs and execution**
Given our past experiences and the recent Nouns Fairs at ETHMexico and ETHBogota, we came up with this budget to make it suitable for ETHSanFrancisco in the US. **We are asking for 23.25 ETH**.
![](https://i.imgur.com/XSlixrD.png)


Costs are approximate. ETH avg. price of 1,200 USD. Prices in red are not final and we'll seek to reduce costs as much as possible. The difference in these prices will be returned to the DAO.

We are excited about this new opportunity to keep creating nounish experiences IRL that can be replicated in other countries. But most of all, to spread the ⌐◨-◨ in a fun way!

**Transactions**
Due to the time sensitive nature of this proposal, NSFW has already funded NounsDAOAmigos to execute on this project.  The 23.25 ETH transaction in this proposal will go to refund NSFW.

votes.reason:
Mono, Ale and the rest of the core team at Nouns DAO Amigos has done an incredible job since day 1. The feedback from their execution in both Mexico and Colombia has been positive and I don’t doubt it will be the same in SF. 

I am curious to see how the experience differs now that it is in a non-latam setting. Either way, very excited to see Nouns DAO Amigos continue to evolve as a core community within the Nouns ecosystem.

Long live El Burrito ⌐◨-◨!

I am a "hell yes"  for these types of Proposals. 

As someone who did the convention circuit for years, I know these displays can really make a long-term impression on attendees. 

I also think they are one of the most impactful OTG initiatives we can do.
Nos encanta el trabajo de NounsDAO Amigos y queremos seguir apoyandolos.
Positive outcomes for the previous events and looks like a solid plan for this one. NSFW was confident to fund this ahead of the onchain proposal which says a lot. ⌐◨-◨
Voting a hell yessss on this...as long as we remember to put the noggles on skilift lol #ugly
Fantastic execution at previous events. Many lasting memories and impressions made. Will be emulating for NFT Fest Australia under the name Nouns DAOn Under.
NounsDAOAmigos kicks ass
NounsDAOAmigos has been doing an incredible job this year!

NounsDAOAmigos have been killing it ever since their first Prop House win. Seeing the activation they did in Bogota was awesome and I can't wait to see more of the same here! 

BTW, they have also been running a really great weekly nounish Twitter Spaces en espanol on The Noun Square SoapBox. You can catch it on Wednesday at 7PM EST here:

prop.description:
# Nouncil Proposal #2

**TLDR**
___


Nouncil is asking for **106.6 ETH** to fund:

 - Operating Costs (2022 Q3/Q4, 2023 Q1)
 - Nouncil Community Grants

**Nouncil** is a council of Nounish Builders. We provide a home for Nounish community and a democratic voice in Nouns DAO governance. 
 - Are you a Nounish Builder? [**Apply to Nouncil**](https://form.addressform.io/f/nouncil-apply-for-membership)
 - Own a Noun? [**Delegate your Nouns to Nouncil.eth**](https://nouns.wtf/delegate?to=0xcc2688350d29623e2a0844cc8885f9050f0f6ed5)
 - Links: [Website](https://nouncil.wtf/), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nouncil),  [Nouns Agora](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/nouncil.eth),  [Collective Profile](https://collective.xyz/nouns/@nouncil.eth)


___

**Nouncil Highlights**
___

 - 94 current Nouncillors
 - Voted on 94 Nouns DAO props ([Record of Votes]((https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Vj7yLxh7VK4TpfN8o8N7oeL-OJb6aYwkx5KegwDPEWg/edit#gid=78755314)))
 - 98% vote participation in Nouns DAO
 - 2 x weekly Nouncil calls discussing Nouns DAO props and news
[Meeting Notes and Recordings](https://www.notion.so/nouncil/Nouncil-Meetings-dbff29c92b794573a3d5124be66aea3b)
 - Voted on most Prop House rounds (12 in total) including Launchpad, Combinator, and Mandates. We use [RankedVote](https://rankedvote.co/) for internal polling.
 - Maintained [Nouncil.wtf](https://nouncil.wtf) and the docs on it
 - Hosted [Tooling Calls](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLX8vKnglYWQUzzhoh1dMuY63OAxcaFLzb) (Conversations with builders of Web 3.0 tools)
 - Created [Nouncil Proposal Incubator](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-kuzF7OJeBsfBWG4llRj-Vn9oC7mJheOboM9CMSAZ44/edit#gid=0) (Proposal workshop and development in Discord)
 - Submitted 9 proposals to Nouns DAO:
 6 passed ([67](https://nouns.wtf/vote/67), [77](https://nouns.wtf/vote/77), [91](https://nouns.wtf/vote/91), [100](https://nouns.wtf/vote/100), [139](https://nouns.wtf/vote/139), [144](https://nouns.wtf/vote/144))
3 defeated ([121](https://nouns.wtf/vote/121), [136](https://nouns.wtf/vote/136), [141](https://nouns.wtf/vote/141))

___

**Operating Budget (2022 Q3 to 2023 Q1) - 55 ETH**
___

Nouncillors discuss and vote on Nouns DAO props on a volunteer basis. Contributions to Nouncil above and beyond that are funded from our general Operating Budget. This is regularly administered via retroactive Coordinapes. See [Nouncil Proposal #1](https://nouns.wtf/vote/67) for a breakdown of what's allowed in our operating costs.

**Prior Funding**

Operating Costs - 2022 - Q1 - 10 ETH
 - [Work Summaries](https://hackmd.io/_1mqJUi0SraJ61o-6IQ71g)
 - [Fund Allocations](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LNVP0DBLPdoxgRy6Cb0egU7TSaljkheJ0idT_JP6koY/edit#gid=1104529391)

Operating Costs - 2022 - Q2 - 12.2 ETH
 - [Work Summaries](https://hackmd.io/NkGCNyY9Rl60GULewpkV_w)
 - [Fund Allocations](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bQ85Z4xa6Tn8GjnkFRZIU5tU1EeC4t5eoLjMrqUmOwA/edit#gid=1524644448)

**Funds Requested - 55 ETH**
  
 - Operating Costs - 2022 - Q3 - 16 ETH
*- 16 ETH round administered at end of Q3*
 - Operating Costs - 2022 Q4 - 2023 Q1 - 39 ETH
*- 6.5 ETH x 6 rounds administered once per month 2022 Q4 (Oct, Nov, Dec) through 2023 Q1 (Jan, Feb, Mar).


___

**Nouncil Community Grants - 51.6 ETH**
___

Nouncils Community Grant Pilot (described in [Nouncil Proposal #1](https://nouns.wtf/vote/67)) was a wild success and an extremely efficient use of ETH to proliferate Nouns. 28 ETH was permissionlessly given to Nouncillors and spent on 18 different projects. 

We held art contests, selfie contests, coloring contests, made hats, merch, jackets, stickers, built web apps, covered cities in Nounish posters, projected art on buildings, created weird 3D videos, distributed POAPs, created NFT collections, manufactured a smoking paper box, and assisted in the development of a "herb garden" facility.

 - [Twitter Thread of Project Highlights](https://twitter.com/nouncil/status/1571956714915733504)
 - [Notion - Full Project Summaries](https://www.notion.so/nouncil/d194d028bb394a03862b20495815b767?v=83c697a1e80348509083df6bae6ecf44)
 - [Noggles ⌐◨-◨ Art Contest website](https://noggles-art-contest.vercel.app/) by [Noadz](https://twitter.com/thenoadz) (one of a multitude of contests)

To be eligible a Nouncillor must have been Nouncillors for at least 2 months and maintained a vote participation rate of 69% or more. As of October 1 this is 43 nouncillors [(proof)](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1on8f5Cmt497xFT7HnDc19cUTt5kIUXU9s5Mn_GAriEg/edit#gid=656549161).

A public call will be held to determine the admin team, who will be voted in.

**Funds Requested - 51.6 ETH**
 - Community Grant Round 2 - 43 ETH
   - *1 ETH x 43 eligible Nouncillors*
 - Admin Costs - 4.3 ETH
   - Coordinating allocations, delegations, and maintaining records
   - Processing payments to Nouncillors
   - Dilligence and observations on ongoing projects
   - Collecting final reports on activity
   - Reporting on success of proposals
 - Marketing Costs - 4.3 ETH
   - will be spent at the discretion of the team managing it, but could include things such as: wrap up Twitter Spaces, interviews with select projects, summary article with highlights / media / quotes, video production

___

**Proposed Transactions**
___

transfer **106.6 ETH** to **nouncil.eth**

votes.reason: I think its fair to say that the Nouncil has been subsidized by the official discord server and i would like to hold off on further funding until we see what type of competition pops up in the aftermath of shutting it down.

Nouncil has onboarded and supported so many builders in this ecosystem since its inception in February. Many builders, myself included, probably would never have found our home in nouns without it, and I think a builder-forward group of nouns-passionate individuals, governing and sharing ideas together is a really special thing that shouldn't be underestimated. 

Looking back on the past 7 months of Nouns DAO governance, I think you'll also find that the majority or fruitful discussion about Proposals, thoughtful vote reasons, and help/feedback provided to Proposers, all came out of Nouncil. 

The Permissionless grants program was a really unique idea (h/t Joel) that inspired tonnes of proliferation projects that took all kinds of forms (see our summary thread about it here: https://twitter.com/nouncil/status/1571956714915733504?s=20&t=b7l9UaOXAyXfw1UUPWSJ0g.) I think a further experimentations with this model (of empowering builders who have proven they care about the DAO and the community) are worth funding. 

Also, Nouncil administrators have been running the day to day operations for most of Q3 unfunded, so this Proposal is part retro reward, part current operating budget, and part runway to continue to build and grow in Q1 2023.

No 🧠er

Nouncil is one of best places for voting discussion, organization surrounding DAO conversations, onboarding new builders and way more.  Nouncil changed the way I learn, communicate and work within the DAO and continues to do so.

UglyDAO approves!

I believe Nouncil has been an important part of Nouns DAO and we should continue to support their efforts in proliferating the meme. Funding builders that have a proven track record to help us grow is a good thing.
Nouncil. That’s it, that’s the vote. ⌐◨-◨
Nouncil has been an incredibly positive force for the DAO – rallying builders and giving them a voice in governance. More please!!
Nouncil has an excellent track record of scaling the DAO's ability to onboard new builders in a capital efficient way.
No nouncil does it better! This is a group of governance focused, nounish humans. The value delivered and available to newcomers to the scene is immensely underrated. And I’m here for it. ⌐◨-◨

Nouncil is a key part of the overall mass proliferation effort within the DAO. I'm confident that the individuals who are eligible for the Community Grant Program will continue to proliferate and develop new ideas of reaching new audiences.
nouncil is nounish af. :salute:
nom nom Nouncil...keep up the good work
Nouncil has proved to be a solid ground for proposal discussion and the initiatives within have been a powerful method of proliferation.

prop.description:
# NFT Fest Australia

![](https://i.imgur.com/BDhKUAS.jpg)

**Requesting 22 ETH** for [Nouns DAO'n Under](https://twitter.com/nounsau) to facilitate an IRL activation as the official "optical sponsor" of [NFT Fest Australia](https://nftfest.com.au/) in Melbourne from 23-24 November 2022.

Following the continued success of [Nouns Fair](https://nouns.wtf/vote/162), the opportunity has arisen for Nouns to make a lasting impression at Australia's biggest NFT event, right when our local industry is popping off.

This proposal is brought to you by Aussie proliferatooooors: [Gami](https://twitter.com/0xigami), [Benbodhi](https://twitter.com/benbodhi), [Jarmen](https://twitter.com/jarmen43), [Mr Boney](https://twitter.com/theboneys), [ThaSwami](https://twitter.com/tha_swami) and [LilPurpBerry](https://twitter.com/lilpurpberry).

## TL;DR

**Showcase Nouns to Aussies** from iconic Melbourne, our cultural mecca for sports, music and the visual arts:

1. **Dioramic POAP powered photo booth** activation so everyone can help us proliferate Nouns to 5,000+ attendees and potential DAO members
2. **Live nounish panel discussion** alongside Kevin Rose, J1mmy, Zeneca, Cooper Turley, Anthony Sassano, Matty (DCLBlogger), Betty (Deadfellaz) and Kieran Warwick (Illuvium) [as announced here](https://twitter.com/NFTFestAus/status/1585080621843746817)
3. **Noggles worn by event staff** with Nouns as the official "optical sponsor," defining our own category inclusive of Gold sponsorship benefits
4. **Street poster campaign** with 200 x A0 colour printed posters targeting the St Kilda area for the leadup and duration of the event

Despite many Aussie nouners and builders, awareness of Nouns in Australia is surprisingly low. But our local industry is booming and we're a home to many Web3 builders, crypto investors and influential Ethereum personalities.

*Global NFT adoption ([finder.com](https://www.finder.com.au/nft-statistics)):*

![](https://i.imgur.com/x3EJ0vs.png)

[Gnars DAO](https://gnars.com) will also be representing Nouns through Silver sponsorship and a screening of [our nounish film](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JQSmfSnRGVk). This engagement has already led to media partnership discussions with [ONE37pm](https://www.one37pm.com/) (Vayner Media) -- feature coverage coming soon!

## NFT Fest Australia

[NFT Fest](https://nftfest.com.au/) has attracted 5,000+ attendees across streaming platforms in previous events and will be running this November's event for over 1,000+ IRL attendees whilst making all content available for free a few weeks following the event. 

![](https://i.imgur.com/Bj9rOqu.jpg)

NFT Fest 2022 will include the who's who of Aussie Web3 as well as representation from all the major Aussie sports leagues and teams, business involvement from Salesforce, KPMG, Deloitte, EY and media publications such as The Chainsaw, ONE37pm, Australian Financial Review and Ticker News.

### Dioramic POAP powered photo booth

Nouns-branded photo station tailored to Australian taste referencing culturally popular memes. Taking inspiration from the Nouns DAOmigos and their incredible success at ETH conferences:

![](https://i.imgur.com/5j9biPW.jpg)

Nounish stage props and noggles will be made accessible for attendees to share the joy of Nouns across social media. Expect it to be a "bloody nounish shindig with all ya mates" – an invitation to join [Nouns DAO'n Under](https://twitter.com/nounsau).

### Live nounish panel discussion

Leaning on a previous [nounish panel discussion during NFT London](https://nftlondon.sessionize.com/session/382247), we will focus on explaining what it means to be nounish, through the lens of building atop Nouns DAO and highlighting case studies such as Gnars. 

![](https://i.imgur.com/wgYSrFJ.jpg)

The goal of such an approach is to inspire others to come and build on Nouns while showing future nouners the potential unlocked by joining the DAO. Our own launch of Nouns DAO'n Under also serves as a [Nouns Builder](https://nouns.build) case study. 

### Noggles worn by event staff

Our iconic noggles are wildly underutilised, especially in the context of collaborative branding and marketing opportunities. We are paving the way and defining our own category as the official "optical sponsor." 

![](https://i.imgur.com/tb9UvSm.jpg)

Additional to Gold Sponsorship benefits: 
* Branding on the registration page 
* Panel speaking opportunity 
* Branding on homepage
* Branding across social collateral 
* VIP access to all events
* Speaker concierge service
* Logo on media wall
* Branding on NFT Fest '22 banners 
* Feature inserts
* Bespoke collateral
* Branding on ticket & event webpage
* Branding on event collateral
* Event ticket allocation
* Inclusion in email communication to attendees pre/during/post event 
* NFT Fest social media channels recognition pre/during/post event

NFT Fest's organisers and event staff have proudly agreed to wear noggles to show their appreciation, make the event unforgettably nounish and of course, have fun!

### Street poster campaign

To raise awareness in the leadup to and during NFT Fest, we will print and distribute 200 x A0 sized street posters in key locations around St Kilda.

![](https://i.imgur.com/iUV8NCU.jpg)

Mr Boney has run similar campaigns in Melbourne to great effect. Prior to rebranding Douns to Nouns DAO'n Under, he received funding from Nouncil to run a tracked experiment and we're able to leverage the relationships built.

## Nouns DAO Contribution

**Required funding (22 ETH) as follows:**

- Optical Sponsor package including Gold sponsorship (10 ETH)
- Dioramic POAP powered photo booth activation (5 ETH)
- Silver Sponsorship on behalf of Gnars DAO (3 ETH)
- Merchandise to hand out during the event (2 ETH)
- St Kilda targeted street poster campaign (2 ETH)

We trust that voters will appreciate the importance and foreseeable impact of making a lasting impression on the Australian scene. Especially considering the depth of current Aussie contributons despite nascent market penetration.

### Funding receival

We've established a 3/5 multisig to receive the funds and the associated proliferatooooors are together co-nounders of [Nouns DAO'n Under](https://twitter.com/nounsau).

* [Gami](https://twitter.com/0xigami)
* [Benbodhi](https://twitter.com/benbodhi)
* [Jarmen](https://twitter.com/jarmen43)
* [Mr Boney](https://twitter.com/theboneys)
* [ThaSwami](https://twitter.com/tha_swami)

Oxigami has a great reputation and a track record of getting things done to proliferate the meme, I am excited to see what he and his team can do here. 

I think these regional OTG activations with local builders are one of the pillars of growing Nouns as an authentic brand.

I believe this particular team will be able to create a unique, nounish IRL experience for event goers. Any/all media content can also bring this activation to life again for anyone unable attend IRL. I look forward to seeing how you nounify NFT Fest!

# Nouns x Never Sit Still

- Create a visually rich, enticing hype video to be a catalyst for the gravitational pull of people into the Nouniverse.
- Sitting above the funnel in the attention marketplace, this hype video will differentiate its positioning from existing Nouns productions, such as [Prop 113](https://nouns.wtf/vote/113), and will compliment these videos by enticing people to WANT to watch more about Nouns.
- Made by a talented team of creatives from Never Sit Still with experience working with some of the biggest web3 brands.
- Perfect to use for openers in digital, trailers, conferences, and meetings, along with use in traditional advertising placements and overall attention attraction.
- Proposal artwork is indicative only, subject to change with further development.
- All CC0 assets.

## Description

Fund NeverSitStill to create a highly crafted, animated 30-60 second brand film. Seeking to catch fresh eyes and celebrate the strides made so far, the future potential and why it’s such an exciting time to get involved in the Nouns project.

![](https://i.imgur.com/CEhktTX.gif)

## Who is NeverSitStill?

[Homepage](https://neversitstill.com/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/neversitstill.tv/) | [Behance](https://www.behance.net/NeverSitStill)

Never Sit Still is highly experienced in creating premium brand films, often focused on abstract or hard-to-explain concepts. We have collaborated with many high caliber clients in and out of web3 such as:

[Compound](https://www.behance.net/gallery/129713109/Compound-III) - Compound III is a collateralised borrowing protocol that optimizes capital efficiency, gas costs, and security.

[![](https://i.imgur.com/ugBEZmu.jpg)](https://vimeo.com/715516917)

[STL](https://www.behance.net/gallery/146273121/Smart-Token-Labs-TokenScript) - A revolutionary new Web3 technology designed to take Token Gating to the next level.

[![](https://i.imgur.com/mjRPzlF.png)](https://vimeo.com/553216699)


[Coinbase](https://www.behance.net/gallery/131256363/Coinbase) - Coinbase is the easiest place to buy and sell cryptocurrency, via a trusted and easy-to-use platform for accessing the broader crypto economy.

[![](https://i.imgur.com/yeJCvDP.jpg)](https://vimeo.com/575631888)

[Adobe Splash Screen](https://www.behance.net/gallery/129640141/Adobe-After-Effects) - Each year, Adobe commissions artists from a variety of disciplines and styles to show off the power of Creative Cloud by producing custom artwork to represent each product.

![](https://i.imgur.com/auygyYd.png)

We at NeverSitStill encourage creative thinking  and personal development amongst the company,  which lead to a conversation about Nouns with motion designer [James Vallance (MrSEAKs)](https://twitter.com/SeaksMr). His collaboration earlier this year with Gnars DAO, and his work with Gami (Noun 189), to create an animated piece for NFT NYC proliferating Nouns. A major component of Nouns' participation in NFT NYC.

See more here: [Full video](https://create.zora.co/collections/0xdcbca59d38eb3abfcb5055fe7bd7f5ce027d03c3) | [Artist BTS & NY billboard footage](https://twitter.com/SeaksMr/status/1553862678795661312)

![](https://i.imgur.com/8ja4qFe.png)

## Proposal

### What will we make for you?

A 30-60 second, crafted hype video that represents Nouns in an exciting way. Exploring Nounish themes through visual metaphor, celebrating the culture with existing users, and onboarding the new.

Think of it as an above-the-funnel video encapsulating the key themes of Nouns in a punchy, artistic, and fresh video to make people go WTF is Nouns?

The look and tone of the piece will be designed to capture attention, potentially becoming an ownable style for future Nouns advertising and messaging material. 

It's a catalyst video to start the gravitational pull that is Nouns.

### What is the video going to be about?

The video will represent strong themes that Nouns focuses on through visual metaphor:

- Use case of NFTs for raising funds for positive change
- Evolution and growth of Nouns
- DAOs/community
- Bootstrapping/launchpad
- Interaction of Nouns and IRL, bringing the power of crypto to IRL

With these ideas at the core, we spin them into a powerful narrative that follows the birth of the Noggles and its exponential growth to become an object of power, one for positive change in the world.

To represent the multi-faceted nature of the Nouniverse, we intend to use a mixed-media approach, with input from various artists within our team. Distinct flavours coming together to create one visual style in a seamless video.

We feel this approach also carries the spirit of the Nouns DAO. A diverse pool of people building something great together.

![](https://i.imgur.com/A0oZVgy.jpg)

### The Nouniverse & Big Bang

In the beginning, at the centre of it all is the Noggle. The Noggle atom, molecule, cell, animal, vegetable, mineral. We want to place the Noggle at the centre of this big bang and follow the narrative of it's growing impact on the universe.

This rippling wave will take effect on the world around it, transforming and creating. What does the world look like through a Nounish lens?

### Why hype video?

The current state of our fast-paced digital world needs information to be condensed into a highly digestible format to relay anything valuable.

[Prop 143](https://nouns.wtf/vote/143) spoke to the fantastic concept of the video marketing funnel. To borrow a term from the Nounish team, we want to talk to the top of the funnel and go even more front-facing, above the funnel. This is why it’s important to create a first point of contact with broader audiences that inspires them to care about what they’re seeing. We want to ignite a spark within viewers to seek out and learn more about Nouns of their own volition.

A hype video executes this perfectly. A short, visually rich video, presented in an artistic, eye-catching way, that grabs people's attention and hooks them in, down the Nouns rabbit hole.

### Do traditional hype videos work in web3?

It’s well known that video is a perfect medium to promote and create awareness of a brand/product. Hype videos are a tool used by luxury brands within web2 and we want to bring these tried and tested methods to web3 and Nouns.

Take the promo video for [Doodles v2](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sv9TaQ5z9jw), or the [Otherside](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qt1equGhkQE) Yuga Labs video. These are both great examples of highly crafted, short animated hype videos to blow up awareness of a brand/product to funnel new audiences into web3 and their brand.

These videos aren't about explaining how, but what and why.

![](https://i.imgur.com/IbzEFzH.gif)

### Video Lifespan

A hype video has a long shelf life and is easy to re-use. Whenever you need promotional content, take an already existing hype video and place it at the front of marketing to interest viewers.

Combine the re-usability of a hype video with assets that are CC0 and you have a piece of art that can be re-used, re-jigged, and a video that can live on for a long time.

Render characters, assets, scenes, and the entire video as CC0 for all to share and spread Nouns proliferation.

### Meta

Air-drop current Noun owners their very own piece of this hype video in the form of NFTs created from scenes of the entire piece. This will create a collection of different NFTs from the entire video.

Owners could even trade/swap/collect these separate NFTs to piece together the sequence and receive a rare airdrop of the entire video minted as an NFT. This is a way to celebrate the creation of the work, and reward holders who were already a part of the ecosystem when it happened.

POAPs for voters. Incentive to vote, a reward for being involved in bringing this project of Nouns proliferation to life.

## Process

![](https://i.imgur.com/pjCL5wT.png)

### Process

We use a traditional linear pipeline for development, from concept through to mastering. This stepped approach allows us to spend an appropriate amount of time in each phase, delivering top notch work in an efficient timeline. At each major milestone, our clients give condensed feedback to ensure that the work is communicating its message clearly.

To ensure the work is original and ownable, we use a period of time for high level research and development. This means we aren't aiming to re-create a reference, but build something new and ownable for the Nouns DAO.

### Pre production

- R&D (Community liaisons to guide content)
- Concept art, thumbnails
- Design, visual language development
- Storyboarding
- Animatic

### Production

- Animation
- Music development
- NFT + POAP creation

### Post-Production

- Compositing, Grading
- Sound design
- Mastering

### Deliverables

- Brand hype video (Widescreen 16:9, 4K, 30fps) [archival master + web ready]
- Working files
- NFT ready exports (TBD with community)
- POAP artwork (TBD with community)

### Production Schedule

Pre production to begin before EOY if approved.

Full production starting no later than January 8th, taking approximately 10-12 weeks to complete the final piece.

### Communications

Regular updates and WIP process interaction with the Nouns community is important. We want to build in public and share progress openly. Our team is comfortable with Discord and presentation, major milestones will be submitted for the community to feedback as well as enjoy the process.

**Contact**

**Gami**  *Noun 189*
**Discord** 0xigami#0001
**Twitter** [0xigami](https://twitter.com/0xigami)

**James Vallance**  *NSS Motion Designer, MrSEAKs*
**Discord** MrSeaks#0944
**Twitter** [seaksmr](https://twitter.com/seaksmr)

**John Grist**  *NSS Creative Lead*
**Discord** brunch#5470

![](https://i.imgur.com/HIqJvZt.gif)

## Cost

### Pricing

- Approx 2.5 months production time
- Project Management
- Visual Development
- Design
- Motion
- Custom Music Track
- SFX (Sound Design)
- NFT & POAP Development
- Source Files under CC0

**110 ETH / 160K USD (approx)**

## Proposed Transactions

- [Multi-sig Gnosis Safe](https://gnosis-safe.io/app/eth:0x44ddf107C7B920312a98F4753Ba209443428c881/home) has been established at [neversitstill.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/neversitstill.eth)
- Signers include [0xigami.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/0xigami.eth), [mrseaks.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/mrseaks.eth) and [a company address](https://etherscan.io/address/0x2eF00c3860bC6Fe48b2508620a883E9b1f90d90F)
- Upon receipt ETH will be swapped for USDC to hedge volatility
- 50% upfront swapped for AUD, remaining 50% at completion

 
 

![](https://i.imgur.com/ls1xRxa.png)

As this video will not really be used to get "views"- my advice (given current vote swing) would be to maybe lower the cost and come with an entire media broadcast package: a few 5 sec Nouns intros, title cards, lower 3rds etc. with both mov files and After Effects files.

prop.description:
# NounsOTG x Stoopid Buddy x Rose Parade

**What do 2 on-chain Props, 1 fifty-foot float made of flowers, and 6 life-sized Nouns have in common?**



They will all be in one place to ring in the New Year for the largest nounish proliferation event ever! [NounsOTG](https://nouns.wtf/vote/110) is partnering with the team at [Stoopid Buddy Studios](https://nouns.wtf/vote/73) for the [Rose Parade](https://tournamentofroses.com/) in Pasadena, CA after New Year's Day, to help Nouns reach an audience of over 38 Million individuals nationwide.

![](https://i.imgur.com/HOT1b1T.jpg)


What will this collaboration look like? NounsOTG will be working directly with the team at Stoopid Buddy in person on the ground for 10 days during this event. The Stoopid Buddy team has covered all build and production costs for the float during this event in [Proposal 73](https://nouns.wtf/vote/73). After multiple conversations discussing how this event could be further bolstered, Aubtoshi and NounsOTG have been asked to be a part of this event. NounsOTG plans on adding to the already-established effort that Prop 73 has put forth in the following ways:

**10 Days of On The Ground Activations + Brand Ambassadors**

After Christmas, all of the floats for the parade (which are being framed out and built off-site) are transported to their final location prior to the parade, which is where thousands of volunteers come to help decorate the floats with flowers. This time period will include full days of OTG (On The Ground) interviews, filming, activations with volunteers, activations with people who are waiting for the event to begin, and more. We will also be filming with the life-sized nounish “walk-arounds” (nouns costumes made by Stoopid Buddy, creators of costumes seen on the celebrity singing show “The Masked Singer”) during this time. Post-event, the floats will be staged in a different holding area to be observed and photographed one last time.

![](https://i.imgur.com/5jlT56O.jpg)
*Nounish "Walk-Arounds" by SB*


Additionally, NounsOTG will scout and hire 10 trained brand ambassadors that will be active the day before the parade, during the parade and afterwards, and at the Rose Bowl when handing out the mini limited edition footballs. The responsibilities of these ambassadors will include being on-brand, walking (waving, jumping, dancing) in a 5-mile parade line. We have allowed for the cost of their food and beverages during specific meal times, transportation to and from the event from the staging area, additional hours on the day prior during the final prep; as well as team meetings, zoom calls and fittings prior to the event, as we plan to deck them out in Nouns Brand and other nounish swag.

![](https://i.imgur.com/sbu1t1L.png)

**Special Guest DJ + Custom DJ Set On The Float + Over 18,000 Nounish Giveaways**

The DJ will be none other than **Richerd Intern**, and his crew will perform with a full/unique set during the live event! Although the parade float images are still not public or released, I can reveal that there will indeed be room for Richerd... 

His team is London based and the cost comes directly from their team and includes their travel and accommodation. We couldn't be more nounish with the Noun266 (Chart Bars Noun head) if we tried!

![](https://i.imgur.com/JiJ5BwX.png)

Over the course of 10 days, we will be handing out over 18,000 unique nounish items, including limited edition mini footballs and shirts, low-fi paper noggles, sticker packs and nouns temporary tattoos. Our goal is to get these items national television coverage during both the parade and rose bowl game. Noggles on the faces in the audience and children throwing nounish mini footballs would be a lasting image during this important holiday event. This opportunity has allowed OTG to connect to other nounish builders and we are open to further collaborations with Nouners and builders.

![](https://i.imgur.com/jp42GOh.jpg)


**Immediate Impact**

If you are unfamiliar with the Rose Parade or its impact, it is one of the major events of the year as the 5 mile parade ends with the start of the Rose Bowl football game. Outside of the 37 million viewers at home, the entire area of Southern California is focused on this event for several weeks prior!

Over **1 Million people** will be in attendance on the day of the parade with a live broadcast to over 37 Million additional individuals nationwide. With a 5 mile parade line and an entire week of content creation and nounish item giveaways prior to the parade as the float is brought to completion, this will be one of the key proliferation event opportunities of the year for NounsDAO. Not to mention the day after the event sees 60-100k attendees that visit the floats to get a close up look at all the details - another amazing activation opportunity.   




**Proposal Cost Breakdown**

Total ETH: 52, Total USDC: $78,000 *amount calculated with 1 ETH = $1,500 USD


* 2.77 ETH: 250 Limited Edition Shirts (Nouns X Stoopid Buddy X Rose Parade)
* 3.50 ETH: 5000 Stickers packs & 5000 Temporary Tattoos + Nounish MVPs for product placement
* 5.65 ETH: Full custom DJ set by special guest DJ (includes Travel & Accommodation for their team)
* 6.45 ETH: 10 Nouns Brand Ambassadors walking next to the parade and handing out items
* 6.55 ETH: 250 Limited Edition Footballs (Nouns X Stoopid Buddy X Rose Parade)
* 11.72 ETH: On-Site Coordination & Production Management: Aubtoshi & Emma & 2 PAs (10 days)
* 14.84 ETH: Travel Costs & Accommodation & Staging Area for Items (10 days)
* 0.00 ETH: 7000 Lo-fi Paper Noggles (Send purchase order to NSFW, no additional funding needed)
* 0.52 ETH: Fees to cover for multi-sig transactions outlined below

To account for any ETH volatility during the time this prop goes through the voting process, we are adding an additional 10 ETH to this prop. After the initial conversion to USDC, any extra eth from this 10 ETH will be immediately sent back to the DAO. Additionally, any ETH left from the Travel Costs & Accommodation budget will also be sent back to the DAO.
**Total ETH amount requested from NounsDAO: 62 ETH**

All funds will be held in a multi-sig wallet that will initiate the following transactions:
* Convert ETH to $78,000 USDC ($780 for txn fees)
* Send any remaining ETH back to the NounsDAO
* $3,395 USDC: Sent to PA1 for on-site production assistance during 10 days
* $3,395 USDC: Sent to PA2 for on-site production assistance during 10 days
* $5,395 USDC: Sent to Aubtoshi for production coordination payment
* $5,395 USDC: Sent to Emma for production coordination payment 
* $8,475 USDC: Sent to DJ + team upon confirmation of their booking and release forms collected
* $9,405 USDC: Sent to OTG to order Stickers, Temporary Tattoos and Shirts
* $9,675 USDC: Sent to OTG to have payment ready for OTG Brand Ambassadors
* $9,825 USDC: Sent to VSVSVS to order limited edition footballs
* $22,260 USDC: Sent to OTG to book travel/accommodation/food/additional costs

**The multisig (2/3) signers are:** 

[**Aubtoshi**](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/aubtoshi.%E2%8C%90%E2%97%A8-%E2%97%A8)
[**Toady Hawk**](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/toadyhawk.%E2%8C%90%E2%97%A8-%E2%97%A8) 
**Nounder 9999**


**Long-Term Value**

Stoopid Buddy has been actively engaged in the community and are clearly delivering on their prop. Outside of creating a successful experience at the event itself, footage from the event will be used in the documentary outlined in [Proposal 73](https://nouns.wtf/vote/73). I have been to the studio in Burbank, I have met the walk-around craftsman and have been trusted by the Stoopid Buddy team to see confidential alpha from their News Years Event and participate in production conversations leading up to it. 

This additional push to create a nounish experience and vibe during the event will connect Nouns directly with all the many people in attendance, plus brand new audiences at home. **While the SB crew are focused on long form video for their documentary, this proposal will allow me and my team to supplement that content with visceral and viral short-form content perfect for social media. All our content will of course be made CC0 and available for future use, ensuring that the DAO's investment in this event is documented and that our brand is seen and experienced by an even broader audience than those reached by the documentary and broadcasts alone.** 

Prop 73 will go down as one of the most successful funded proposals to date for NounsDAO, not only for its reach and high quality production, but for real nounish interaction with so many real people. I feel honored to have been asked by SB to help with the on-site activation piece for the Rose Bowl Parade, to ensure that our Nouns national television coverage has the best visuals possible with lasting effects. I look forward to the opportunity to bring this NounsOTG activation to life!

prop.description:
# Nouns Builder Protocol

# Nouns Builder Protocol
### Public Infrastructure brought to you by Zora and NounsDAO

![](https://i.imgur.com/JycpSjR.png)

**Mainnet Launch:** November 1st
**Expected DAO Launch:** November 15th
**Website:** [nouns.build](https://nouns.build)
**Twitter:** [@nounsbuilder](http://twitter.com/nounsbuilder)

Like you, we believe that Nouns DAO is a significant form factor innovation for NFTs and DAOs. Instead of giving all power and capital solely to a project’s founders, the Nouns model enables communities to emerge progressively, and to be active participants in how their brand and community evolves.

We believe that more Nouns forks should exist - so we’re building a tool anyone can use to build them.

For the past couple of months we have been working on the Nouns Builder: a product that makes it easy for anyone to create their own Nouns DAO with any art, any auction cadence and flexible DAOs that can evolve over time.

As we’ve been building this tool, we’ve increasingly realized that it makes sense to use this very tool to create a DAO that will govern, sustain and develop the Nouns Builder project itself. By doing so, Nouns builder can:
* Demonstrate the utility of Nouns Builder as a public good
* Utilize the ecosystem of tools in Nouns: Prop House, Agora
* Experiment using the NounsDAO model as an alternative to the subDAO multisig
* Experiment using the NounsDAO model to proliferate a protocol and products
* Expand use of the NounsDAO model as a more effective governance model for collective decision making
* Share governance of this DAO with Nouns, Zora, and future contributors as interested in expanding the horizon of this public infrastructure as we are. 

We are going to call this DAO “Builder”, with its own art and NFT that will be minted each day. Builder will be NounsDAO from day 1, with the goal of proliferating this infrastructure.

**Core details to note:**

* Based on extensive feedback from the Nouns community, the protocol is entirely free. There is currently no protocol wide fee.
* DAOs can opt in to gift a certain amount of their NFTs to Nouns or any other DAO or platform
* In prior versions of the proposal, we proposed that NounsDAO would be the deployer of the Builder DAO. Based on feedback from the community we have removed this aspect of the proposal.
* The protocol development has been extensive, with careful consideration made to
    * Enable DAOs to easily upgrade and evolve themselves over time in a safe manner
    * Be gas efficient
    * Open up room for exploration around new distribution types like VRGDAs
* The protocol has been audited via Code4rena, with Zora paying $129K USDC ($90k in prizes) to complete it.
* We have built an easy to use tool at [nouns.build](https://nouns.build) where over 60 testnet DAOs have been created in the process of testing and refining the user experience.

**Ask:**

1000 ETH contribution to seed the Nouns Builder DAO treasury to help this public good reach its full potential. 


**Completed Work:**

Rather than requesting retroactive reward for development, ***we are asking NounsDAO to pay it forward* by seeding the Builder treasury with ETH** for funding the development of the Nouns Builder protocol as a public good and expansion of the ecosystem by the community. 

Zora contributed ~4 months of development time on creating the Nouns Builder protocol
* Full time contributions from the Zora solidity, backend, and front end engineering teams
* Full time design and creative direction for Nouns Builder artworks.
* ~100 ETH spent on the Code4rena audit.

This contribution to the Nouns Builder DAO treasury means there is sufficient Day 1 capital to immediately conduct prop house mandates and funding rounds for the development, proliferation, and accessibility of the protocol and ecosystem for the benefit of the public.

**Deliverables:**
* Audited Nouns Builder smart contracts.
* Custom Nouns Builder generative artwork (CC0).
* Builder DAO for anyone in the community to join and contribute.

**All of the ETH will be going to the Nouns Builder DAO treasury.**

**Builder DAO:**

The Builder DAO is created using the Nouns Builder tool and protocol. It is the entity onchain that will be responsible for funding the proliferation of the ecosystem and development of the protocol over time. 

We believe Nouns Builder represents critical public infrastructure for community decision making, and we want to use the full power of the NounsDAO model to further this protocol and ecosystem of different apps built on top of it, as well as being able to natively tap into tools in the ecosystem like Prop House and Agora.

BuilderDAO creators will receive the following governance rights in the Builder DAO for a period of 5 years after Builder DAO’s launch to allow the creators to support of the growth and development of this public good while in its nascency:
* 1/10 to zora.eth
* 1/20 to nouns.eth

For clarity, DAO members shall not receive any revenues from Builder DAO daily auctions. All funds in the Treasury shall be dedicated to improving the Builder DAO protocol and its public good function, and growing the community, brand, and ecosystem. 

The Builder DAO will start with a daily auction. The NFTs that will be minted each day are a nounish artwork that expands on the ideas of “Internet flags”, a collection of unicode symbols that communities can organize around, with the nounish colors at its core, as well as the noggles.

Here is a sample of the codex below:
![](https://i.imgur.com/kArgmJn.png)


**NounsDAOs for Public Infrastructure:**

We believe it is important to experiment with Nouns forks as a way to further particular pieces of infrastructure within the nounish ecosystem. Instead of funded LLCs and companies to ultimately manage tools like Nouns Builder and things like Prop House, we want to actively explore using a Nounish DAO as the primary entity to further a public protocol and an ecosystem of many platforms built on top of it. 

This is why we are leading from the front with the Builder DAO. We are also optimistic that this can become a blueprint for any team that is developing protocols—like Zora itself. 

**Sustainability:**

In prior proposals there have been open questions around the future models for sustainability without need for persistent funding from NounsDAO all the time. We believe that this is the first meaningful step in this direction, and we hope to set a precedent and blueprint for future teams to build sustainable Public Infrastructure that is native to the Nouns ecosystem and DAO itself.

**Transaction Details:**

1000 ETH transferred to an escrow smart contract that will hold the funds until the Builder DAO is live and operational. We are expecting this to be live on approximately November 15th.

**References:**
[Discourse post](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/proposal-nouns-builder-draft/2007)
[Prop house](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/prop-house-protocol-public-infrastructure-by-nouns-dao/1594)

![](https://i.imgur.com/yPwwE6T.jpg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/M31ZnVx.png)

![](https://i.imgur.com/GLLYhTu.jpg)

prop.description:
# Nouns DAO V2.1 Minor Fix

## Summary

This proposal updates the Nouns DAO logic contract to a new version, with a single minor improvement:

**Vote with Gas Refund**: change refund destination such that multisig voter that pays for gas get refunded, rather than sending the refund to the multisig contract. 

Technically, this change involves refunding `tx.origin` instead of `msg.sender`.

Exact changes can be seen here: https://github.com/nounsDAO/nouns-monorepo/pull/604

Because this change is very minor, we're not going through an official audit process. This change has been reviewed thoroughly by technical DAO members (solimander & vapeape).

## Proposal Transactions for Humans

* `_setImplementation`: upgrades DAO logic to V2.1.

For any questions, we're available on the #54-tech-grants channel on the nounish discord

verbs team ⌐◨-◨
