prop.description:
# Nouns Name Service Expansion  ⌐◨-◨

**TL;DR After being funded for [2ETH by Prop House](https://prop.house/nouns/round-2/63) 7 months ago, we have built an entire, functioning naming service called Nouns Name Service (NNS, built on the .⌐◨-◨ domain.) We are now asking the DAO to fund us to bring Nouns Name Service to the next level.**

The Nouns Name Service (nns.xyz) is a naming system that aims to empower communities and spread the nounish culture.

The main Top Level Domain of the Nouns Name Service is the .⌐◨-◨ .

Just as a .eth is resolved in yourname.eth, having a .⌐◨-◨  will allow you to attach the Nouns DAO noggles to your on-chain identity and be resolved as yourname.⌐◨-◨ .

[![nns-screen.png](https://i.postimg.cc/7YhPfPhN/nns-screen.png)](https://postimg.cc/crqGzSQK)
[*nns.xyz*](https://nns.xyz)

## Background
The Nouns Name Service (NNS) received 2 ETH in Prop House – Round 2 (April 2022) as trial funding to prove out the concept and build our reputation as trustworthy builders in the ecosystem.
 
After 4 months of work we delivered the first version of the NNS (nns.xyz) and in the first month post-launch, we have already created a powerful ecosystem of partners which allowed the NNS to be natively resolved across the Nouns ecosystem.

[![Xva8Rxz7.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/MZCxK0kz/Xva8Rxz7.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/6TfFMv5P)

## Summary
This proposal will allow the NNS to build the infrastructure required to start phase 2 of our strategy: Expansion.

In particular, these are the main goals of this phase, which will be completed over a 5 months period:

* Integrate the NNS into new DAOs, apps and marketplaces outside the Nouniverse.
* Integration of an additional .nouns TLD that will help overcome .⌐◨-◨ copy-paste problems on external apps making its applications more flexible and effective.
* Create a DAO powered by Nouns Builder to empower the NNS Squad, our community of people who got their .⌐◨-◨, with an experimental treasury to reward members and finance new initiatives.
* Build new utility tools around the NNS. The first in the pipeline is a nounish NNS version of EtherScan. 
* Launch the Nounish Club project to push proliferation in and outside the Nouniverse through a new experiment of community reward and participation.
* Create a full documentation for end-users and developers expanding the ways in which they can integrate the NNS in their projects.
* Start the first experiments and collaborations for Phase 3.

**Requesting** funding of 195 ETH to execute our Expansion Phase.

Funds will be immediately converted in USDC to avoid volatility exposure of any kind.

[![NNS-proposal-artwork-2.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/yd7g5qPr/NNS-proposal-artwork-2.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/SXtx2vHW)

## How the NNS started
The idea of the NNS originated from a question:
 
*“Is there a way to transform a meme icon into a fully functional domain, where its utility grows proportionally to the meme adoption?”*
 
During the first months of work, this idea evolved from its very first draft on Prop House, letting the NNS become a possible solution to several interesting scenarios:
 
* In an ecosystem based on CC0 like the Nouniverse, with a lot of new communities and sub-DAOs, the .⌐◨-◨ could become a universal tool for companies and creators to interact with the entire ecosystem at once.
***How so?***
The power of a CC0 ecosystem is the proliferation of a main idea in many sub-projects and communities. In the Nouniverse, that idea is represented by the ⌐◨-◨ meme. The noggles appear in every nounish community, but at the same time they are part of different NFTs and collections. At the moment, there isn’t a token that can unify the Nouns ecosystem at an infrastructural level. The .⌐◨-◨ can fill this gap, allowing companies and creators to reach the whole ecosystem by simply integrating the NNS into their token-gated experiences and initiatives.

* The more the NNS is integrated on new apps and marketplaces across the world, the more the .⌐◨-◨  will help spread the nounish culture at an exponential level.
***How so?***
The NNS serves as an on-chain identity badge for all the people who share the nounish culture. Having your .⌐◨-◨  attached to your web3 identity makes it clear that you belong to the “nounish internet society”. The more the NNS will expand, the more the Nouns proliferation will reach places that wouldn’t even have been considered before.

* In a market dominated by 2 titan projects and few TLDs, the NNS could become the first experiment of a collaborative naming system on ETH. This would allow other communities to join the NNS and create their own TLD on top of the NNS, making the whole protocol stronger and more widely adopted, and offering the new communities the advantage of having their TLD natively resolved across the NNS network from day 1. 
***How so?***
Once the Nouns Name Service is globally recognised by important apps in the space, it could open its network to other communities as well. This way, communities will not only get their customized TLD (that’s nothing new), but this will be able to be natively resolved everywhere from the very beginning. This will literally onboard in the Nouniverse and in Nouns DAO whole communities made by end-users and talented builders, constantly bringing new ideas and improving engagement thanks to a proven system of funding based on Prop House, Small Grants and all the other nounish DAOs.

**In a nutshell,** for a community joining the NNS would mean not only having a naming infrastructure, but also being able to build and nurture important relationships in the Nouniverse that will push new ideas and collaborations with the entire ecosystem.

These applications, which at the moment represent our focus, will offer Nouns and the Nouniverse an important value in terms of proliferation, new users in existing nounish platforms and the attraction of new builders.

And we are confident this is just the beginning of many other applications for the NNS.

[![Nouns-Name-Service-NNS-works.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/CKSxMGqR/Nouns-Name-Service-NNS-works.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/bZVh32LP)

## Roadmap (The 3 Phases)
Building this kind of Naming System is a big task. Which is why we split our development in 3 Phases. After the first one is completed, the NNS will be able to move to the next one, and so on.

### PHASE 1: Core Ecosystem and Community
The power of any protocol lies in its network.
That’s why our top priority since launch has always been to build a strong core ecosystem from which we can expand.

While new naming systems often rely on external plugins to resolve their names, the NNS aims to create a network where every NNS name is natively resolved without any additional action by the users.
 
At the time of writing, the NNS has been supported by all the major nounish projects, officially connecting the Nouniverse. 

[![Nouns-Name-Service-NNS-projects.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/SNcXyNvt/Nouns-Name-Service-NNS-projects.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/RNVCd99c)
 
**ENS reservation period and stats:** 

During the first 60 days after launch NNS names could only be claimed by their correspondent .eth.
 
While this impacted the NNS growth in the very short term, it also allowed the early adopters to have full control of their identities, thus focusing more on identity than speculation.

The ENS reservation ended on 19 October 2022 with the following results:

* 355 names claimed
* 252 unique owners
 
As you’re reading this, after 4 months of development and 2 months of Reservation Period, Phase 1 is officially completed.

At this time, 2 weeks after the end of the Reservation Period, a total of 526 .⌐◨-◨  names have been registered from 311 unique owners.

[![nns-launch-artwork.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/KvH4WgjG/nns-launch-artwork.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/mt7bzk7J)

### PHASE 2: Expansion and Nounish Club

Phase 2 will start the real proliferation of the NNS.

As mentioned in the TL;DR, the Expansion phase will have several goals, starting from the integration of the NNS in new DAOs, apps and marketplaces outside the Nouns ecosystem, also solving the .⌐◨-◨ current copy-paste issue. 

Part of the Expansion will also be the building of an NNS Scan, which you can picture like an NNS version of EtherScan. We will also create a new and more complete website, where end-users and developers will be able to access a full documentation so that they can find new ways to integrate the NNS in their projects. 

The NNS Squad will also have access to an experimental Treasury which will be used to reward active members and finance new missions.

Finally, and what we believe is the most exciting part of this Phase, we will launch the Nounish Club project to push proliferation through an experimental form of community reward and participation. 

At the end of these developments, we will start the first experiments and collaborations for Phase 3. 

### The Nounish Club 

The Nounish Club is an experiment made to reward nouners, nounish projects and communities outside the Nouniverse through new forms of community participation.
 
The idea is to allocate to this initiative all the numbers from 0 to 9999.⌐◨-◨, making them a new coveted asset to stimulate NNS proliferation and inspire new community ideas.

However, these numbers won't be available to be bought from the NNS.

They will only be earnable by taking active part in .⌐◨-◨ proliferation and in special initiatives, and they will be entirely distributed for free through what we like to call a “Proof of Proliferation” process. 

The Nounish Club will be an exclusive group inside the NNS, completely in the hands of the Nouniverse.
 
Every nounish project will be able to add a special benefit to the club, such as discounts, NFTs, voting power, early accesses and more. They will also be able to ask the NNS to get a specific allocation of numbers to be shared among their communities or to be used as assets to keep in their treasury.
 
The more benefits will be added, the more the access to the Nounish Club will be valued.

Here are some key points of how this would work:

* The NNS will allocate an initial amount of numbers to the NNS Squad DAO created through Nouns Builder. This will add an additional asset to the treasury that will be managed according to DAO voting.
* For the first 6 months, the numbers from 0 to 669 will be reserved for Nouners. Every existing nouner, as well as new ones, can request their specific numbers offering their help to proliferate the Nouns Name Service or to add benefits to make the Nounish Club more valuable. 
* Specific numbers would be used to invite new strategic users into the Nouns ecosystem.
* Nounish DAOs and projects would be able to request a certain allocation of numbers for proliferation initiatives. This will make the distribution of the Nounish Club more and more decentralized.
* If the experimental allocation to the NNS Squad DAO is successful, the NNS will gradually allocate a bigger amount of numbers to the DAO over time. 

The Nounish Club benefits will be grouped on a url like nounishclub.wtf and new proposals about ideas, benefits and allocations can be managed through the NNS Squad DAO and discussed on the NNS Discord.

The Nounish Club will also use Prophouse as another important tool to generate and reward new ideas.

#### Why the Nounish Club?

We are exploring what the NNS can become through a continuous loop of never-tried before experiments and feedback. The Nounish Club is one of them.

The reason we are excited about the Nounish Club is that we believe it can be an interesting experiment which, if successful, will be able to create a massive value for every community in the Nouns ecosystem.

This value can be seen as:

* **Building value:** It will be a further incentive for nounish communities to build cool things for the NNS and the Nounish Club.
* **Proliferation value:** It will generate a further proliferation of the .⌐◨-◨  and can be used to onboard strategic users into the Nouns ecosystem.
* **Economic value:** The more the NNS and the Nounish Club will grow, the more every name of the Club will be valuable (incentivizing more building around it).

[![NNSproposal-artwork3.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/90rG85XH/NNSproposal-artwork3.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/hQRzvY72)

### PHASE 3: Protocol

Once the NNS is supported by the major platforms in the space and successfully completes all the other tasks, it will be ready to open the protocol to other communities.
 
This upgrade will allow other great projects to build their TLD on top of the Nouns Name Service.
 
This will strengthen the relationship between the Nouniverse and worldwide communities working together for the proliferation of the Nouns Name Service.
 
Dwelling on the developments of Phase 3 is not the focus of this proposal, which aims to focus on the Expansion and Phase 2. However, our ultimate mission is making Nouns the center of a naming revolution that will attract not only end users, but also companies and other big projects.
 
Some aspects of Phase 3 are still being brainstormed and we can’t wait to share more details with the community when they’ll be ready.

## FUNDS

### Personal context for full transparency from Dom (@dotnouns)

Besides the 2 ETH received from Prop House in April, all the NNS development was bootstrapped.

As a founder and a true believer in the NNS, since the end of May I decided to commit 90% of my time on the project, gradually reducing the personal clients I was following in my day job.
 
If this can seem a hazard to many, burning the bridges that could act as a way out allowed the project to be laser focused on execution and allowed the NNS to become what it is today.
 
The goal of this proposal is helping the NNS to build a starting fund that will push the development and the proliferation with the same laser focus that has characterized Phase 1.

### The request in a nutshell

We are requesting 195 ETH to scale the NNS, fully complete Phase 2 and begin experiments for Phase 3 as well.

Funds will be immediately converted in USDC to avoid volatility of any kind.

### How the funds will be used

The funding from this proposal will serve to develop the following areas, which will be crucial for the long-term success:
 
·  	**Expand the team** and hire top professionals for specific tasks or projects. In particular, main focus will be given to external integrations and community building.
·  	**Design a website** that will offer more support to end users and developers. This will include an extensive tech documentation and FAQ section.
·  	**Create a DAO for the NNS Squad through Nouns Builder.** The DAO treasury will be used to coordinate proliferation actions among members and to manage the allocation of numbers for the Nounish Club.
·  	**Create an NNS House on Prop House** focused on building new products for the NNS ecosystem, the Nounish Club and developing new integrations with important partners.
·  	**Push proliferation** in and outside the Nouns ecosystem through the Nounish Club.
·  	**Add a new .nouns TLD** that will help overcome .⌐◨-◨ copy-paste problems on external apps, thus making its applications more flexible and effective. 

### Thoughts about the .⌐◨-◨  copy-paste “issue”

One frequent objection about the .⌐◨-◨  is that noggles are not easy to type on the keyboard. This is indisputably true.

The .⌐◨-◨  is first of all an identity badge of the Nouniverse. That’s why it’s natively resolved on all the nounish platforms without any effort or action by the user.

Even if every tool built around the NNS would make writing the .⌐◨-◨ easy as a click, to expand the applications of the Nouns Name Service we are also exploring the creation of a .nouns TLD.
This domain would ease the integration of the NNS in several apps (especially wallets) and would unlock interesting additional applications.

In the future, NNS users would be able to connect all their NNS names to this core extension and from their dashboard they could decide how they want to appear in their favorite communities.

This development is still in brainstorming mode, but we wanted to share it to give some context about our initial focus and what we’re going to work on next.

### Milestones and funding release

In an effort to show our commitment and laser focus in the NNS mission, we decided to divide the funding allocation in 2 tranches.

The first 97.5 ETH will be unlocked upfront and will cover the first 3 months.
In particular, during this period we will: 

* Launch and proliferate the Nounish Club project and its DAO
* Release the new website with a full documentation
* Complete the first new integrations with projects outside the Nouns ecosystem
* Start the first experiments with the .nouns extension. (If everything works smoothly we will be able to release it during the first 3 months, otherwise it will be launched in month 4.)

The list only refers to the goals highlighted in this proposal and doesn't include actions that will be part of the ordinary proliferation strategy of the NNS, such as community initiatives, viral actions and collabs with other projects in and outside the Nouns ecosystem.

At the end of the first 3 months, these milestones will be checked and verified by nouns community members Toady Hawk and Benbodhi.

If this first Milestone Check is successful, the second and last part of the funding will be released.

### Multisig Wallet

Funds will be managed through a Gnosis multisig wallet (2/3) with the following trusted signers:

* [Dotnouns](https://twitter.com/dotnouns) (NNS)
* [Toady Hawk](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/toadyhawk.%E2%8C%90%E2%97%A8-%E2%97%A8) (Proposal Sponsor and Milestones Checker)
* [Benbodhi](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/benbodhi.%E2%8C%90%E2%97%A8-%E2%97%A8) (Milestone Checker)

## Conclusion

This is what the Nouns Name Service is right now, and what it could become.

We realize it’s an ambitious vision, and that there might be challenges and many things we didn’t predict, as for every venture in unexplored waters. 

However, ever since the beginning, we’ve tried to earn the community’s trust. We are now fully committing ourselves to something that could be extremely beneficial for the Nouns ecosystem in the long term.

**If you believe in this project, we ask you to consider supporting this proposal, so that we can together build the future of the Nouns Name Service!**

votes.reason: Would love to see more devs on the team. Happy to help where I can.

I have followed Dom (@dotnouns) on his nounish journey since literally day one, when he came onto our Prop House Spaces to pitch his mvp for a Nouns naming service.  Since winning that round (2 ETH), I have seen him work so hard to set up and roll out the .⌐◨-◨  network and identities that many of us love and use every day. 

He has also reached out to every corner of the nouniverse to make sure .⌐◨-◨ is natively resolved almost anywhere you want to interact, from nouns.wtf and Agora to basically any nounish auction site you can think of. 

He built all this foundation nearly for free, almost seven months of blood, sweat and tears for a couple ETH. Now he is asking the DAO to believe in the potential of the network and his plans for it, and I think it’s a worthwhile endeavor to give him some funding and runway to do so. 

Phase 2 is all about proliferation of the .nouns (NNS) network and I think the planned 3-pronged approach of 1) continuing to integrate more communities to resolve . ⌐◨-◨ natively, 2) running social media campaigns and the Nounish Club initiative to make nns names more desirable and 3) seeding/spinning up a DAO with Nouns builder to create a flywheel of community proliferation using Prop House and other methods to reward community members who help spread the .⌐◨-◨ meme, is a powerful strategy to get as many nounish people as possible using this network daily (and therefore proliferating nouns across web3.) 

Nouns will never have a token like $APE and I don’t think it ever needs one. But absent that, I think .⌐◨-◨ is a really cool and low-friction way to unite communities all over the nouniverse, and I’m looking forward to seeing what Dom and team can do with some ETH and a little runway. 

Also, if the team does NOT knock this out of the part with their efforts in the first 3 months, Benbodhi and I have the right and obligation as multisig signers / milestone checkers to send the second half of the funds back to the DAO instead of releasing them. I of course don’t expect this to be necessary, but it does nonetheless lessen the outlay risk in my opinion, if you trust our judgment.   

I was happy to support Dom by sponsoring this prop on chain after seeing all his work on NNS to date, and happy to vote yes here.

TLDR: not yet; I think this should be re-proposed with further feedback and iteration. I'd love to fund further proliferation of NNS, and to retro reward the work done so far. However, the proposal's budget allocation is too vague for me to assess if the funds will be well spent; for example, with the current greatest challenge being proliferation, it's unclear how much will be spent on that; I'd also love to have more granular details on what proliferation experiments will take place, since I have no past data to be confident on reputation alone. Finally a pet peeve of mine: all multisigs handling large amounts should have more than 3 signers, particularly when the signers don't have a strong security reputation.

I like what has been done so far but its too big an ask too soon with too vague a roadmap for what is essentially a task of proliferation and im not quite clear on the deliverables. 

I think this needs to be broken up and I actually think it is good that this comes at the same time as Prop 171 - which I think could fund this and get a bit more product market fit, using their guidance and support, and see where we are at after that. 

I appreciate the communications you have done and I have read what was said in the Nouncil chat. A rejection of this proposal is not a rejection of the work done so far. Keep it up.

i appreciate the ambitious vision laid out in this well-structured proposal. if the team was able to get this far with 2 eth from a small prop house round, i'm excited to see where they can take this when fully funded.
I would like to see this broken up into smaller grants across the phases. The request is too large and the roadmap is too much hype at this scale.
what even is this?

What I find a bit sketchy is that I'm wary of the fact that there's no disclosure about who financially benefits from NNS  succeeding. This prop is asking Nouns DAO to promote a specific NFT collection (the NNS NFTs). Those NFTs are sold for ETH and someone gets that ETH. It concerns me when props don't make that type of financial incentive clear and upfront and hide behind "we proliferate nouns" and seeming as a public good when they are not. In this way NNS is not a public good (free public infrastructure) like prop house or nouns builder and thus should be dealt with a bit more skepticism imo.

I love Dom and what he's done with NNS, and strongly believe he deserves more than 2ETH in retro funding for his efforts over the last several months.

However, I am against this prop as it stands currently because I do not believe it is the most effective way of proliferating the meme via namespace.

Getting adoption of en ENS fork is going to be VERY difficult outside of noonish communities – especially given many wallets like Coinbase already have their own ens subdomain.

I'd be much more excited to see a version of NNS that is built on top of ENS, either through a subdomain or via the acquisition of a TLD from ENS – spreading the meme organically probably faster.

In addition, we might see fragmentation for builders and users: there is currently one reverse resolution name per address, with this version of NNS there's two

Interesting project that is helping foster community signalling/proliferation

.noggles is top 5 eth domains usage (albeit 99.99% people are .eth but theres room for growth and more endings are coming online and being utilised to signal their community) 

+ with the advent of .nouns (text) working in sync with the noggles to allow for easy typing. Not needing to paste the noggles icon is a decent ux advance  

 I am in support of the project however for the tech involved this ask is too high. 

Would support 20-40 eth ask

Nouncil is voting FOR this proposal after an internal poll saw 53 YES, 10 NO and 11 ABSTAIN votes. 

Some excerpts from Nouncil discussion:

"This is super exciting!
very well written/thought out"
Al409

"Yes - a wonderful way to proliferate. Interesting to gamify naming systems, too, by reserving 0-669 to Nouners. Almost synonymous with the value of early number ENS’s." -Brook

"As one of the very first projects to integrate the NNS initial code into a front end, FOODNOUNS loves NNS. 

The high level concept is a no brainer. We will all benefit from an exponential and creative growth of NNS." -Cheffo

"Love this initiative " -Boanez

"I think nns is fun, i like seeing it in the auctions, but i feel like at the end of the day, its still just a gimmick. " -Maty

Join the Nouncil Discord for some of the best Proposal discussion happening in the ecosystem: https://discord.gg/s9aGsAzzM2

Appreciate the way Dom has approached this: small Prop House round and over-delivered. Bootstrapped and didn't ask for money and over-delivered. Now coming with a big idea and a big vision. 

I think the questions about traction, market fit, and onboarding new communities are great questions and could be challenges for NNS. But I don't want to answer those now with a 'no' since we don't know those answers. In the spirit of giving great builders a shot at pulling off big ideas and visions, Ugly says we want to give Dom and NNS the chance to pull it off. 
#Ugly

The NNS is an amazing endeavour in identity and has been bootstrapped with very little so far. This is the kind of thing that has visual impact and appeal that I feel is very suitable for the nouniverse and beyond.
Let’s see where this can go!
.⌐◨-◨

Though I am a big fan of the NNS in general and am proud to be part of the first extensions to resolve the .⌐◨-◨  on yolonouns.wtf, nounstown.wtf, and puppetsamurai.wtf I am not sure there is enough traction at this point to give it the "hell yes" from me. If this prop does not pass I hope DOM makes some revisions and brings this back on-chain with a bit more focus on adoption, both with users and resolvers. I also think we should have some retro reward for all of his efforts over the past 7 months.

i support the NNS initiative and feel we should compensate for the work up until this point, but I would like to see a bigger focus on proliferation/marketing plans for NNS as opposed to integrations and updating website

prop.description:
# DCS Pod

## tl;dr ##
DCS is a pod that focuses on bridging the gap between existing off-chain funding options and larger on-chain props. Focused primarily on the sectors of software, arts and IRL with a funding range between 8-25Ξ, our goal is to help builders with a track record scale up within the Nouns ecosystem.

## Overview ##

There currently exists a large gap within the current Nouns funding landscape that creates challenges for Nounish builders in the ecosystem. 

On the lower end of the spectrum, there are many options for builders to seek funding for <10Ξ, between NSFW, Prop House, and a number of subDAO efforts (Gnars, SharkDAO, Lil Nouns, etc). On the higher end, there is virtually no limit as we have seen on-chain props go to $1M and beyond.

However, in between these two points there is a gap that continues to grow as we see NSFW, Prop House, and subDAOs prefering to run more experiments with smaller amounts, all the while prominent Nouners are increasingly calling for the DAO to scale upward and not consider on-chain props lower than 20Ξ.

This places builders in a tough spot where they must figure out how to take their concept from point A to point B to achieve escape velocity. This issue is further exacerbated by the closure of the official Nouns Discord server, which will make it harder for the DAO to reach consensus on on-chain props as a governing body.

DCS will focus on working with these builders who have "graduated" from one of the off-chain funding programs and provide them with bridge funding and guidance as they work towards the goal of passing a larger scale on-chain prop with the broader DAO base.

Said a different way, we help builders **Do Cool Sh*t**.

![](https://i.imgur.com/pMkWTM2.png)

## Pod Details ##

DCS pod members will leverage their Nounish network and experience to guide and work with builders to ensure their further success in the DAO. DCS will act as a working group to ensure our funded builders are provided more than just capital but an active group to collaborate with and build alongside.

**The pod plays a key role in four ways:**

- Creates a stepping stone for off-chain "graduates" on their journey to larger on-chain props, both in terms of financial support and guidance in refining their project
- Provides accountability and additional data points for the broader DAO to consider when the resulting props go on-chain
- Emphasizes a transparent decision making framework that is data-driven and scalable
- Actively works with builders to ensure their further success in the DAO by being a source of active support and guidance helping them move through the roadblocks and challenges they face

**What areas will the pod focus on?**

DCS will focus on key areas where we feel we can provide the most value and help ideas scale quickly. Given the subject matter expertise and experience of pod members, the following areas are our initial focus: 

- **Software** - dApps, smart contracts, mobile apps, gaming
- **Arts & Content** - artists, musicians, video and content creators
- **IRL** - local/regional activations, events, and other on-the-ground efforts


**How will the group operate?**

- Props (sourced from off-chain funding programs) will be be submitted to the pod online
- Prop will be discussed on weekly DCS calls
- Prop will be voted on in the DCS Discord

We will work with the operators of the various off-chain funding program to raise visibility for DCS as a "next step" for graduates. We will use Prop House and/or [AddressBoard](https://www.addressform.io/) to receive formal funding requests, so we can ensure proper data collection throughout the process for the DAO.

The pod will convene once a week on an open call to discuss what has been submitted since the last meeting and to discuss additional pipeline developments. These calls will be available to the community. This will foster discussion about props, help engage with builders and elevate the quality of props that get funded. Emphasis will be placed on data-driven processes to ensure greater builder accountability and proper measurement of ROI back to the DAO.

After discussion, pod members will decide which props will be funded by voting on a dedicated Discord channel (or via Prop House platform).

Pod members are required to attend weekly meetings and actively give feedback on props. Pod members can be removed and replaced based on participation (which will be decided by the remaining members of the pod). Pod members will be rotated every 3-6 months in order to spread knowledge, boost decentralization and to ensure the pod is not overly reliant on any single member. A maximum of 2 pod members will be substituted at a time, not to create disruption in the work flow. One pod member will be elected secretary by the pod, and this person will take care of administrative tasks including providing a summary of the meeting in writing, which will be available to the public through the DCS discord.

The committee’s gnosis safe will require 3 of 5 members to sign.

Budget: 126Ξ
Breakdown:
* Props: 75Ξ
* Admin: 51Ξ
    * Target prop funding: ranging from ~9x8Ξ - 3x25Ξ projects
    * 5 pod members
        * Core member: 3Ξ per month
        * Secretary: add'l 2Ξ per month

For context, this is 0,4% of our treasury. We are aiming to propose a low-risk/high-reward pod.

## Pod Members ##

1. **[B](https://www.nounsagora.com/delegate/beautyandthepunk.eth), yours truly.** 

    **Twitter:** @beautyandpunk 
    **Discord:** thebeautyandthepunk#8285
    **Specialty Areas:** Art, esports, sports, extreme sports, onboarding, science, underrepresented communities
    
    **Props/Nounish Highlights:**

    **Nouns**
    Prop 41: Nouns 3D-printed fashion collection by DANIT: milestones 3+4
    Prop 82: Sell Noun #253 to Lil Nouns DAO
    Prop 95: Nouns @ Art Basel (Basel, Switzerland)

    Prop 118: NounsDAO Brazil
    Prop 119: Nouns Esports Pod

    2 rounds of 5 x 1ETH props through Lil Sisters.

    100 Nounish hoodies for homeless people

    Nouns OS as an entire Operating System Nouns-Themed for All Things Nouns

    -Prop 126: Nouns x John Hamon 
    -Prop due diligence with builders to hash out and iterate on prop ideas such as Prop 116: Comic Book Release and Prop 135: Xanadu
    -Working with NFT Paris organizers to assemble a nounish activation in 2023 (discovery phase)
    -Active contributor in Nouner weekly calls 


4. **[Sam Ellis](https://www.nounsagora.com/delegate/thepencil.%E2%8C%90%E2%97%A8-%E2%97%A8)** 

    **Twitter:** @manofmissle, 
    **Discord:** samellis ⌐◨-◨#4764
    **Specialty Areas:** Gaming, art and design, animation, comics, conventions/irl events, charity, onboarding
    
    **Props/Nounish Highlights:**
    Participated in the first days of testing nouns on Rinkeby
    Active Nouncil member that regularly participates in voting
    Active participant and on the organizing committee for The Noun Square
    Participant in the funded Prop 70 (CC0 Pitchbook)
    Co-developed Composables    
    Co-developed YOLO Nouns
    Co-developed Nouns Auction Tracker
    Co-developed Nounish Labs & 1/2 owner of Noun 455
    Introduced Samsung to Nouns which lead to their video in Times Square and 837X DCL experience.
    
5. **[Juan](https://www.nounsagora.com/delegate/juanx.eth)** 

    **Twitter:** @juanhernanx 
    **Discord:** Juan ⌐◨-◨#2492
    **Specialty Areas:** Software, dApps, smart contracts, mobile apps, business, finance

    **Props/Nounish Highlights:**
    Nounish Labs: Owner of Noun 455
    Co-developed Composables
    Co-developed YOLO Nouns
    Co-developed Nouns Auction Tracker
    Prop House: Crowdsourcing Ideas round winner
    Prop House Challenge: Composables
    Prop House: Nounish Hackathon
    Active Nouncil member    
    


---


If at the end of the 3-month period not enough good props were found and funded, the funds will be returned to the Nouns DAO treasury. If the props funded were to be successful, leading to cool apps/tools/community building/engagement, we would ask for the continuation of the work through extended funding (granted by a new on-chain prop).

prop.description:
# Fund Trustless USDC Payments Contract

## Summary

In order to pay builders directly with USDC, we have deployed a contract (`TokenBuyer`) which swaps ETH for USDC on behalf of the DAO.

We propose to fund `TokenBuyer` with 625 ETH in order to acquire a USDC buffer of $500K (there's a baked in volatility buffer; any extra ETH will be used for later proposals or can come back to the treasury).

Future proposals created from nouns.wtf will automatically "top off" TokenBuyer with additional ETH, minimizing the need for additional funding proposals.

## Motivation

Many proposals have costs in USD (or other fiat currencies) and would prefer to request USDC for the DAO instead of ETH.

It is not trivial to swap ETH to USDC at proposal execution time without being subjected to sandwich attacks and getting bad swap rates.

## Solution

The tech pod developed [TokenBuyer](https://github.com/nounsDAO/token-buyer) - a suite of smart contracts that allow permissionless swapping of tokens.

TokenBuyer will allow proposals to request payment amount in USDC.

The swapping of ETH to USDC happens asynchronously, meaning:
If the DAO doesn't have enough USDC on hand, it will register a debt for the remaining amount. As soon as the rest of the USDC is available, it is sent to the recipient's wallet, no user intervention needed. We expect this to take a few days at most, depending on the total amount.

TokenBuyer allows anyone to swap USDC for the ETH it holds. It uses Chainlink's ETH/USD price feed to set the price.

Whenever a proposal requests USDC from the DAO, it will also include a transaction to top up TokenBuyer with additional ETH, proportional to the USDC amount requested.

(*This "automatic top-off" is part of nouns.wtf; other governance clients can choose whether they implement this behavior*)

### Example:
* Builder A creates a proposal that requests 100,000 USDC
* 2 actions will be added to the proposal:
    1. Send 100K USDC from the TokenBuyer to Builder A
    2. Send $150K worth of ETH to TokenBuyer to swap for USDC
       * The extra $50K (50% buffer) is added in case ETH price goes down
       * If TokenBuyer already holds ETH, then it will be sent less ETH accordingly
* When the proposal executes:
    1. 100K USDC it sent to Builder A
        * If TokenBuyer has less than 100K USDC on hand, a debt will be registered towards Builder A
    3. TokenBuyer will swap ETH for 100K USDC
    4. Any remaining USDC debt to Builder A is paid as soon as it is swapped

### UI preview

This is a preview of a new proposal creation flow for nouns.wtf developed by Brian.
It will go live once it's possible to request USDC.

![proposal_ui_1](https://i.imgur.com/cOqFO3V.png)
![proposal_ui_2](https://i.imgur.com/vZNqCJ7.png)

### Parameters

* `baselinePaymentTokenAmount`: amount of USDC to hold "on hand". Currently set to $500,000.
* `botDiscountBPs`: a price discount to incentivize anyone (probably bots) to swap USDC for ETH. Currently set to 10 bps (0.1%).

### Admin access
* The tech pod & the DAO have an "operator" privilege with permissions to:
    * Modify `baselinePaymentTokenAmount`, allowed range is: 0 - $1M
    * Modify `botDiscountBPs`, allowed range is: 0-150 (0-1.5%)
    * Pause TokenBuyer swaps
    * Withdraw ETH from TokenBuyer and send it to the DAO
    * Change the operator
* Only the DAO has the ability to:
    * Send USDC
    * Change the allowed ranges for `baselinePaymentTokenAmount` and `botDiscountBPs`

### Arbitrage bot
* A reference bot has been developed and [open-sourced](https://github.com/solimander/eth-buyer-arbitrage-bot) by solimander. We encourage anyone to run their own bot or improve on the code
* The tech pod will be running the reference bot at the beginning to bootstrap the system
* Anyone can perform swaps against TokenBuyer. If we see low activity, we will increase the `botDiscountBPs` parameters to increase the incentive (e.g. if gas prices become high).

## Auditing and Testing

* The smart contracts were audited by yAcademy. [Audit report](https://github.com/nounsDAO/token-buyer/blob/166ec30ecd5dada8e17b55317ce3823d4c36b35f/audit/yAcademy_NounsDAO_TokenBuyer_review.pdf)
    * No "critical" issues were found
    * 1 "high" and 1 "medium" issues were found. The "high" issue was fixed, and the "medium" issue was acknowledged as not being an issue for us.
* Prior to this proposal a few rounds of funding and spending using Token Buyer were done on mainnet


## Funding
* Assuming `baselinePaymentTokenAmount` is set to $500K, we would want to fund TokenBuyer with enough ETH to swap for $500K. We suggested adding an extra 50% to account for price changes. At current ETH prices this 750,000 / 1200 = 625 ETH
* The initial ETH amount will be sent to the tech pod multisig
* The tech pod will deploy it into TokenBuyer in chunks while monitoring that it performs correctly

---

Included Transactions:

* Send 625 ETH to: `0x79095391743e0f017A16c388De6a6a3f175a5cD5` (Tech Pod Multisig)

prop.description:
# Sail Nouns in the New York Harbor for NFT.NYC 2023

![](https://i.imgur.com/PHkFAtJ.jpg)

### TL;DR
 - Fleet of seven J/24 sailboats with Nounish sails and one bigger sailboat
 - Photo and video opportunities in front of Manhattan, Brooklyn Bridge, Statue of Liberty
 - 100 guests onboard will actively participate by steering boats and trimming sails 
 - Post-event meetup at the Manhattan Yacht Club’s clubhouse

# Description

### Why Sailing?
I ([fiveoceans_dev](https://twitter.com/fiveoceans_dev)) have been sailing for 11 years and recently combined my passion for sailing and love of Nouns by organizing a regatta through Seoul (funded by [Prop 102](https://nouns.wtf/vote/102)). Sailing is one of the most prestigious sports and often gets attention of the media, guests, and residents. It's enjoyable to participate in, to watch live, and creates beautiful images and video to share.


### Nouns in the New York Harbor
NFT.NYC is only four months away. Most likely NFT and web3 projects are going to run the same promotions with posters and billboards. *Why not make something different?*

Following the success of [Prop 102](https://nouns.wtf/vote/102), I would like to organize a sailing event on April 9th in New York with help of Manhattan Yacht Club. The NFT.NYC sailing event is going to be order of magnitute larger to match the gravity of the legendary New York.


I will put together a fleet of seven J/24 sailboats and one bigger sailboat in New York bay with Nounish sails. We are going to invite Nounish people and sail together from New Jersey to Manhattan, Brooklyn Bridge, and the Statue of Liberty.

We'll be using J/24 sailboats for this event because it is the world's most popular one-design keelboat. It is a classic Porsche of sailing and respected by all sailors. It is easy to sail and looks beautiful when you get up the Nounish spinnakers.


### Interactive Community Building
The plan is to make teams of 3 experienced sailors and 3-4 guests for each boat. The guests will be able to actively participate by steering boats and trimming sails. We are going to use one bigger boat to accomodate all guests and swap guests on boats near the Statue Of Liberty so all the guests can get full experience. 100 people will be invited, with priority to for the Nouns community. 20 invitations will be sent to special NFT.NYC attendees (media, artists, etc.) 

It is going to be unforgettable experience. Later, we can gather together at Manhattan Yacht Club's clubhouse and share a few beers.

Let's enjoy early spring sailing in NYC together and use this unique opportunity as a team building and proliferating event. A lot of New Yorkers and visitors are going to see Nouns logos during NFT.NYC and posted on social networks.

### Documentation
All events/locations before and during the event will be documented and all media will be regularly shared with the [nounish ⌐◨-◨](https://twitter.com/nounish) team and posted on social networks.

----
# Details

### Event map
![](https://i.imgur.com/ysZx8iI.png)

### Nouns branded sail designs
![](https://i.imgur.com/S7SfqsE.jpg)

Based on sail inventory availabe at Manhattan Yacht Club, it would be best to buy both mainsail and spinnaker sails. The available at manhattan yacht club sails have mount gay rum logos and wouldn't look good during our photo ops.

Discussions on sail designs and upcomming events will be posted on twitter and nounish discord.

After NFT.NYC, the sails will be shipped and stored in my yacht club, in korea for possible future Nounish events.

There are four different design options availbe
1) same color fabric, red noggles
2) same color fabric, different color noggles
3) different color fabrick, red noggles
4) different color fabric, different color noggles
![](https://i.imgur.com/Jiz8Rn0.png)

IMO most of the beautiful thing about nouns community is collective hacking, designing, and thinking. I would like to get feedback from community to find best sail designs. 


----
# Budget
### Nouns NFT.NYC sailing photo op & team building
We going to invite as many people as possible, starting with Nounish folks. The event would be a best way to proliferate Nouns and organize a team building event for Nounish people.
- **$24,000** Chartering fees for 7+ boats at Manhattan Yacht Club
    - I received quote of $3,800 per boat for a general public
    - The price might go down after I send an official request from my yacht club
- **$35,000** Nouns sails inventory for 7+ boats
    - (branded spinnakers and mainsails)
    - I wil keep all the sails safe for future possible events. For example, NFT.NYC sailing event in 2024!
- **$10,000** Small travel grants for sailing teams comming from Seattle, San Francisco, Texas, Michigan, Maryland.
    - We need experienced crew to operate sailboats.
    - The plan is to make teams of 3 pro sailors and 3-4 guests per one boat
- **$15,000** Safety and media motor boats etc
    - It is very important to have a couple motor boats available for media or in the case of emergency
- **$5,000** The big boat is going to accomodate more guests. Later, on the way back from the Statue Of Liberty, we aregoing to swap guests and give more people chance to experience J/24 sailing.
    - NFT.NYC is a big event and we might want to invite a lot of interesting people to the Nouns sailing event
    - Also, some parts of New York bay is no fly zone for drones so it would be best to put a few photographers on a bigger boat
- **$15,000** photo/video team
- **$5,000** Nouns branded t-shirts and caps to look like a true team (120 pcs)
- **$5,000** BBQ, beers, and rum for after party at Manhattan Yacht Club
- **$21,000** expenses for operations team including me; $7k per person (I will need at least two reliable people with sailing experience with me to organize 7+ sailboats, photo ops, coordinate everyone etc; getting ready venue and boats 2 days before the event; 2 days cleaning boats and packing everything after the event)
- **$15,000** budget for unexpected expenses and price offset (we can use some money to make invitations, rent more sailboats, buy more sails, stickers for boats, add more safety measures, shipping or storage for sails after the event etc)
- **$10,000** I would like to request a small compensation for my efforts to plan the event for next 3 months.

**Total: $160,000 or ~134 ETH (1 ETH = $1,200)**

We are asking for $160,000. It is a lot of money but it is worth every dollar if you look at everything we are going to accomplish.

----
# Person in Charge
I am [fiveoceans_dev](https://twitter.com/fiveoceans_dev), member of Nouncil, creator of [Prop 102](https://nouns.wtf/vote/102), sailing since 2011, and love Nouns Community.

---- 
# Multisig
The receiving address is a Gnosis Safe with 4/6 signers.

**Multisig address**: 0xAC2671bAaA44b79cA1Fb006750c684E5349d721b

**Multisig signers:**
1. **toady_hawk**: 0x5D802e2Fe48392c104Ce0401C7ECa8a4456f1F16
2. **benbodhi**: 0x80826180A2629206E3499B5167aaC8440E3F87f6
3. **adrianmcli**: 0xE7304bA0f157f2Ade94015934284b6704BC72911
4. **Brennen**: 0xf8a065f287d91d77cd626af38ffa220d9b552a2b
5. **142**: 0xE6232ed3436C4065D38D8BFdC8EA90858ecDfa69
6. **fiveoceans_dev**: 0xDf6e59c6DF1E9500fd35A76FF4C62F9901E90019

$160,000 USD = ~134 ETH (1 ETH = $1,200 USD)
Adding 15% buffer for volatility: 154 ETH

**Proposed Transaction**
```
0xAC2671bAaA44b79cA1Fb006750c684E5349d721b.transfer(
 154.0 ETH
)
```

### Swap Plan
Upon receipt of funds, signers will convert the ETH to $160,000 USDC.
- Leftover ETH will be sent back to Nouns DAO treasury
- $60,000 USDC will be sent to fiveoceans_dev's wallet upon conversion
    - the money will be used to book sailboats, and pre-order sails 
- $100,000 USDC will be kept in the safe until all the details of the Nouns NFT.NYC sailing event are finalized and posted (date, event program, sail designs, invitations)

prop.description:
# Proposal tracking by maty

**TLDR**: Fund maty to continue tracking all funded [proposals](http://www.proposal.wtf) (46 ETH saved) and writing [newsletters](https://nouns.substack.com/) (over 16k views) for 5.5 ETH/month.

## About me
Active in nouns every day for a year, founding Nouncil and Esports Pod member, Discord mod (rip), NSFW team member... but most of my work has been centered around a weekly newsletter and proposal tracking dashboards I have created in Notion.

## Tracking proposals
**Problem:**  It's hard to follow individual projects after they get funded, the information is scattered. Accountability is important.

**Solution:** 
- I'm following up with builders of all funded projects, providing a way for builders to share all the awesome work they've done
- Saving the data to Notion [proposal.wtf](http://www.proposal.wtf) - 5 interconnected dashboards with all the important info, allows anyone to quickly and easily search for any project, filter and sort them based on various properties or see all projects by a particular builder.

Thanks to these follow-ups, I have contributed to **46 ETH being returned to the DAO** (from 2 proposals with leftover funds).

**Future focus:** 
- Getting cleaner-looking dashboards up on nouns.center (in collaboration with cdt, you can already find the Communities list we made [here](https://nouns.center/groups))
- Working with the Agora team to display relevant information in Agora profiles


![](https://i.imgur.com/1sdJQWz.gif)




## Newsletter 
**Problem:** Information overload, hundreds of funded projects + even more seeking funding. With the dissolution of the official Discord server, this only got worse.
**Solution:** 
- Weekly [newsletter](https://nouns.substack.com/) highlighting the biggest things happening around nouns, showcasing new proposed projects, new on-chain proposals, art, and more. Serves as an information distribution mechanism and as a historical snapshot of the DAO. [*Example*](https://nouns.substack.com/p/raising-from-the-ashes).
- Special posts for Prop House rounds with TLDRs of all proposals (and other functions when needed) everything in one place, easy to read. [*Example*.](https://nouns.substack.com/p/prop-house-special-nouns-launchpad-9da)
    - this helps us more effectively deploy capital via Prop House
- Newsletter data:
    - over 50 posts already (6 a month on average), with **over 16,000 reads** in total!
    - latest posts get around 350-400 readers
    - subscriber count is in a steady uptrend from the start, currently at 430

**Future focus:**
- highlighting the newly emerging communities
- special posts with big proposal updates (highlights of changes from the dashboards)

![](https://i.imgur.com/c54uvvl.gif)


## Funding
Previously my work has been funded via NSFW (monthly, based on the amount of work, 4.5-5.5 ETH), but since now I am an active member of NSFW, I am seeking funding via on-chain proposal.
I am asking for **5.5 ETH a month** for 7 months:
- 1 month retro for October (7 newsletter posts, maintaining the dashboard and adding a new one - Communities/Groups)
- 6 months going forward, paid via Sablier stream (until the end of April)
- A total of 38.5 ETH

prop.description:
# PropBox: A Nouns Proposal Incubator

## TL;DR

Using lessons from a Nouncil trial program, we will set up a robust incubator that will help the best builders in the ecosystem smoothly navigate the Nouns DAO proposal process.  

**Our goal is to leverage the breadth and depth of skillsets within UglyDAO to help nounish builders communicate well and find pathways to funding, so that they can keep doing what they do best:** 

**BUILDING.**

[![andrew-propbox.gif](https://i.postimg.cc/fbwksjjM/andrew-propbox.gif)](https://vimeo.com/774011051/886e16a979)
*Click to watch a 3 minute video summary of this proposal.*

# The Challenges



1. **The Nouns DAO Proposal Process Can be Daunting to New Builders.**
    
    Writing a proposal is difficult. Conveying a good idea in a way that voters can understand and relate to is even more difficult.  With the increased number of proposals and ideas coming in weekly, it’s more important than ever to effectively communicate one's idea and value proposition.  For some builders, proposal writing may not be a core strength. So their proposals may fail on-chain, even if the core concept is valuable.
    
2. **Effective Communication with DAO Voters is Difficult**
    
    One of the most difficult challenges for builders in the Nouns ecosystem has always been figuring out how to have open dialog with voting Nouners and Delegates. These challenges will only increase as the DAO grows. Now, with the Official Nouns Discord closed, this is an even more pressing issue. 
    
3. **Constructive and Honest Feedback is Rare**
    
    Very few people within Nouns are giving truly honest and constructive criticism to proposals that need work. Discourse and Nouncil feedback sometimes can be “soft”, as people may not want to publicly discuss the potential pitfalls of a fellow community member’s idea or hurt their feelings.  We see this occurring more frequently with on-chain proposals, and it doesn’t help anyone in the long run.



[![boxbrain.gif](https://i.postimg.cc/14xN6w0Y/boxbrain.gif)](https://postimg.cc/wRVvYtGh)*Think INSIDE the box!*


# Our Solutions

**PropBox will aim to solve the above pain points in the following ways:**

1. Ugly Dao has a talented roster of builders, many of whom have experience writing successful proposals for Prop House, NSFW and on-chain. We also have professionals with experience in the legal, marketing, education, and communications fields. With our combined training and experience, we can help builders create proposals that make an impact. Additionally, sometimes the most difficult part of seeking funding from Nouns is **knowing where to go.** We can help proposers understand if their idea is best suited to a Prop House round, an NSFW pitch, a discussion with the newly minted DCS Pod, or a full on-chain proposal. Finally, we believe that proposals should lean on multimedia content to achieve maximum impact in an attention-scarce environment. We want to help builders integrate engaging videos and visuals into their proposals.

2. We know the Nouns community like the back of our Ugly hand, and can help new builders navigate the difficult task of amplifying the message of their proposal. From appearances on The Noun Square, discussions in Nouncil or other Nounish discords, as well as conversations on Twitter, Discourse, House of Nouns and elsewhere, we know how to help builders with the most difficult part of getting funded for a proposal: **Communicating directly with the people who ultimately will vote yes or no.** 

3. The DAO needs more well-intentioned people who are not afraid to give would-be builders The Ugly Truth, and we are prepared to do so.


# The PropBox Value Prop

Our goal is to become the premier resource to help builders create great proposals and find pathways to funding in the Nouns ecosystem. We plan to find and incubate teams and projects from multiple sources, including:

- Current builders in the ecosystem who are looking for feedback and help navigating the proposal process.
- New builders who need extra help onboarding into Nouns, writing proposals, and making the right connections to be successful.
- “Uncut gems” from Prop House and Discourse to fund proof of concept projects and prepare the teams for potential larger on-chain proposals in the future. We aim to find builders with the highest potential and help them fulfill that potential. Ideas from this category should have at least 10x potential from the amount of initial funding.

# The Origin Story

This project began as an initiative by [Andrew ](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/andrewladdusaw.eth)[Laddusaw](https://twitter.com/AndrewLaddusaw), through [Nouncil](https://discord.gg/nouncil), following the [Combinator Round in Prop House](https://prop.house/nouns/open-round:-25-eth) back in July (aka “the before times.”) Andrew saw a lot of talented teams that submitted great proposals, but of course the round only had one winner for the 25ETH prize. 

He began contacting builders and building a system within Nouncil Discord to give these teams feedback to prepare them for an on-chain proposal, or to help them secure alternative funding sources. When they began reviewing proposals publicly as a group, other builders asked for help as well.

During this initial trial, the Incubator team gave feedback to 9 proposals. Through that process: One secured funding through NSFW. One pursued another Prop House to fund a proof of concept, won, and later joined Nouncil. One ended up abandoning the initial idea, but moved on to other projects during the incubation process, and has now been funded for multiple other projects within the DAO (shout out [ripe0x](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/ripe0x.eth).) Two other proposals ended up with on-chain votes, one narrowly being defeated and one securing funding for 40 ETH (Prop 144 for One Click Bots). 

[![andre-testimonial.gif](https://i.postimg.cc/JnndSt6P/andre-testimonial.gif)](https://vimeo.com/774010662/b852cb4533)
*Click to watch a 2 minute PropBox testimonial video from Andrei (BotFrens)*

We learned a lot through this experiment. We’re continuing to follow up with the builders as they hone their ideas, and expect to see even more fruit from these efforts in the coming months. We’re also continuing to improve our feedback process and we believe we’re ready for the next phase of growth.


# The Timeline

**This proposal will support the PropBox team for a 3 month period to do the following:**

- Actively locate builders in the ecosystem to help drive their ideas forward and guide them through the proposal process that is most appropriate to their ideas and building stage.
- Create an active Builder’s Guild in the PropBox Discord, where those who are creating tools and proposals can do so in the open, and together. This well help create consistent startup energy in the Nouns community.
- Review every Discourse, and various Discord community posts, making sure everyone submitting proposal ideas gets quality feedback and the best possible Nouns experience when they first arrive in the community. One of our greatest desires is that new, talented builders would not leave the community discouraged after getting negative feedback, simply because they didn’t understand the funding process or the culture of what it means to be a part of Nouns.
- Create a website to house a toolkit of templates, best practices, tips and tricks, and contact information giving builders a toolbox to maximize success.
- We will also spend the next three months exploring several ideas, which we will present to the community at the end of the proposal funding period:
    - *How to potentially make an incubator like this self-sustaining in the future.*
    - *A system to temperature check proposals and gather feedback from as many sources as possible, including from those with the most likelihood to swing vote outcomes.*
    - *How to create efficiencies in the proposal process, so that new community members can transition from their first interactions to building as effectively as possible within the DAO.*
    - *Exploring systems of trust-building to make sure that scammers are not able to abuse the treasury through gaming or fraud.*
    - *Decisions about what form this group should take in the future; how to incorporate new members, ideas, and processes to maintain the highest degree of quality feedback, help, and value to the DAO.*


All of the above is to serve the ultimate goals of PropBox: 

**To help builders write high quality proposals, and to make decision-making simpler and less time-consuming for DAO members.**

# The Budget

**75ETH** **Total**

- **60 ETH** - In our trial, we were able to achieve a great deal of success with people who were just volunteering their time. We know that with DAO funding, we will have much more capacity to onboard talented builders and incubate many more proposals. 
    - **20 ETH** per month as a payment to team members, to be paid retroactively based on work completed and builders helped. This work will include engaging builders at every stage of the proposal process, guiding them, and helping to write effective and media-rich proposals. These team rewards will be distributed via biweekly Coordinape rounds (Nouncil model.) All payment data will be publicly available to the DAO. 
    - Our team goal will be to engage with a minimum of 30 builders about their proposals over the course of a 3 month period. 
    
- **10 ETH** for a pool to fund some small projects, as an experiment in additional targeted flexible funding for the DAO: Taking small ideas that we encounter through the process of our work and helping those teams to execute small ideas or create MVPs of larger ones. 
- **5 ETH** of retro funding for what has been done to build this system already.

# The PropBox Team

We are a group of Nounish builders that have created and executed successful proposals at every funding level. We are consistently active in Discourse, offering constructive feedback and working privately with builders to help them formulate effective proposals and seek funding. We are passionate about great ideas, effective communication, and robust proposals that drive the nounish meme forward. ⌐◨-◨

[![propbox-group-shot-smaller.png](https://i.postimg.cc/qvQ8CwwZ/propbox-group-shot-smaller.png)](https://postimg.cc/ZWB9Gr1r)

- ***Lead: [Andrew Laddusaw](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/andrewladdusaw.eth)***
- ***Core Team:***
***[BradQ](https://twitter.com/iambradq)***
***[ProfWerder](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/profwerder.%E2%8C%90%E2%97%A8-%E2%97%A8)***
***[SuperTightWoody](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/supertight.eth)***
***[Toady Hawk](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/toadyhawk.%E2%8C%90%E2%97%A8-%E2%97%A8)***

***Support: Other UglyDAO Members***
*18 super builders and counting with diverse skills and talents who are passionate ambassadors for Nouns inside and outside of the community*

**Multisig:**
*Funds will be transferred to and held in a 3/5 Gnosis Safe (propboxvault.eth) with the 5 trusted Nouns community members above.*

# The Bottom Line

We believe the DAO needs to attract more awesome builders, and needs teams of diligent people finding good ideas and helping them to bloom into full-fledged, effective Nounish initatives. 

We are uniquely qualified to help these builders write awesome proposals, strategize ideal funding paths, and facilitate DAO communications, and we are asking for a mandate to do exactly that. 

## Think INSIDE the Box, vote YES for Prop 175!

votes.reason:
I struggled with this prop. While I love the team, I don't believe this effort will lead to an optimal outcome for the DAO. Given my recent posts on scaling small grants, I believe Prop 175 takes us in the opposite direction.

- Inefficient capital allocation
The prop asks for 65Ξ to allocate 10Ξ, a ~90% admin overhead.

- Non-scalable approach
The approach appears to revolve around "consulting" services that are very manually intensive and do not scale, unless we want to employ a small army of consultants at the DAO like a Deloitte, Ernst & Young, PwC, KPMG, etc.

- Unnecessary creation of static website tools
We should lean into automated tools like Prop House or AddressBoard. Information repositories already exist in the form of Nouns Center, which is already linked to from the main Nouns website.

- Unclear outcomes or measurements of success
How is success being measured here? What benchmarks would need to be hit so we can decide if we want to fund an effort like this again (or clone it in other areas)?

I encourage the team to discuss this with the builder community and come back with a prop that addresses the broader concerns raised on their efforts.

You can read more on the reasons here: 
https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/on-scaling-small-grants-at-nouns/3080
Not sure this does anything more to promote nouns. Nothing stoping folks from asking the community to engage and get better proposal crafting completed.

I like the prop and the team. But have some issues with it:
1. no discourse, not open to feedback from the community.
2. not clear on payment: 20 eth/month for team “to be paid retroactively based on work completed and builders helped”. How is that measured? How much will the team get paid, who decides, and what is done with the money left over (if any)?
3. no transparency on how the 10 eth for builders will be distributed, how the decision process will be made and if anyone will be able to know about it.
4. the “5 eth of retro funding for what has been done to build this system already” - what is this for exactly? The network? Who is getting paid?  
Not being scalable is not really an issue for me as I think this can stay at the same size and be helpful. 
For a prop that talks so much about feedback, I’m surprised none was asked.
So I’d welcome this prop again, after it had gathered feedback on these and other issues from the community.
https://twitter.com/niftynaut/status/1597235868888023041

I think this group of high potential and diverse builders will offer a warm but constructive landing place for builders to seek guidance and get personalized help to making a good prop idea great, helping it get proper attention and ultimately sponsoring it on chain.

https://twitter.com/0Hindsight/status/1597224514714505216?s=20&t=MpS_QmTZBFgfPegGk8VpLQ

- Can see this leading to a misalignment of incentives.
- Dont think a consultancy for proposals is needed when we have nouns.centre and discourse as well as NFSW and DCS etc
- It includes a 5eth retro reward and it looks like there will be a retro reward for the same thing by Nouncil (should have waited for clarity on that before posting)

I'm not convinced that it's a good idea to create an intermediary consulting team that tries to increase the quality of props.

In theory, there should be sufficient incentive for the proposers to already do that given the fact that they receive grant funding at the end. Gathering attention, community buy-in, writing a great proposal should all be a part of the proof-of-work required to get a prop passed.

Having said that, I'm all for making it easier to communicate your prop (by adding functionality to clients etc.)

Nouncil is overall in favor of 175. Nouncillors voted 34 YES, 7 NO, and 2 ABSTAIN (using the new anonymous Discord voting powered by Nerman Bot.)

Some excerpts from the discussion thread:

"There should be multiple options for builders to choose as partners for their props. These things are our babies and we want them to be handled by people who share same values and care. If we don't have these options  I think that we will drive away many ...  the only people that have interacted with my requests for help there are the same people putting this prop together so I am all in to support this prop which I think will help so many" 
-Klim

"I have voted yes because I see this as a pilot and a building block for growth. The team includes some of the smartest, strongest communicators and most well meaning people in the ecosystem. I trust the intentions, durability and consistency of the team. "
-Cheffo

"Prop discussion is a very valuable service that people in Nouncil have been providing without any clear reward in sight, and the people in this prop have all been actively providing prop feedback without compensation for months." -Joel

"This (reads) like a request to allocate 10 ETH with an overhead of 65 ETH to fund the team, which is roughly ~90% overhead" -Juan
helping people know how to build on Nouns is nounish ⌐◧-◧

Abstaining due to being a member of UglyDAO who is not working on this specific prop. This is not saying prop builders should avoid voting on their own props, just personally want to steer 100% clear of any potential conflicts of interest in this specific instance

Andrew, Prof Werder, Brad and Woody have been working hard for months to help builders on discord and discourse, and help them navigate the sometimes-labyrinthian corridors of Nouns DAO funding. Anyone who doesn't think there is a need for helpful, skilled people to empower would-be builders and plug them into nouns DAO ecosystem, I would argue probably do not spend much time on the front lines of the DAO. Because those who do, will have their DMs full of exactly these types of requests on a daily basis. I would like to see this team get funded and either prove the thesis wrong or right over the next quarter. If they are able to unlock the nounish potential of 30+ builders and get them funded by one of the funding sources within nouns, I think the outlay will be well worth the cost.
Navigating prop creation and DAO governance isn't a core competency of most potential contributors. An effort like this should make DAO funding more accessible to competent builders.

There is immense value in this proposal. The amount of people looking for help with creating/editing proposals is huge and the ecosystem will benefit from a skilled crew stewarding them.
I personally haven’t had the time to help all the people that ask. So it will be great to have a place to send them.

full disclosure: i'm ugly. 

one of the main reasons i decided to stick around the nouniverse after striking out with my first few prop house entries is the reception i received from the people on this team. they welcomed me into the community and invested in me as a builder by helping me work through my original proposal. 

i'd never had an experience like that in a community before. and it made me want to dig in and keep building cool shit here. i don't know if i'd still be working in the nouniverse if it wasn't for this team.

i'm voting yes on this because i believe new (and old) builders will benefit from having this team focused and dedicated to guide them through the proposal process. which in turn will benefit the dao with better and more successful projects.

it's in this team's best interest to have the projects they touch become successful and accountable. and i know they'll go above and beyond to do that.

Seneca: 
While I like the enthusiasm and appreciate the team's effort to put this forth, the proposed outcomes feel vague. If the end goal is to get builders funded - I'd much rather see the team pursue a small amount of funding to run their own grants program. This way, it is much easier to measure success while also allowing the team to find/consult with builders.

9999:
The team is passionate and well placed to execute on this idea. I think it’s reasonable to get funds to test out a consultancy/incubator on a small scale, but I dislike subsidizing this entirely for 3 months when there’s an obvious business model. 
In general, I am for the consultancy model and believe it can bring qualified builders to the DAO. To that end, the market has the ability to signal whether the PropBox idea/team/approach works and funding to the extent requested would distort this process.
In addition to reducing the timeline and funding amount, I would recommend voting for this proposal if it had target metrics: 1 month, interface with 10-15 builders, target 1-2 amazing on-chain proposal, include a “finders fee” to subsidize the funding gap.

devcarrot:
I agree with the other Nounders that there should be a market for this type of advising that takes the form of a "finders fee" or "tip". I would like to see this proposal changed to either include more discrete objectives or, as Aubtoshi mentioned, expanded to be a source of earlier funding. During the Agora debate it was brought up that a place for builders and proposal authors are able to gain some clout, PropBox could be a way to incubate those with potential and build better proposals along the way.

As an onboarding and upstreaming platform for Nouns, SharkDAO has experienced the need for this type of service first hand and think it's worth experimenting with how to reward community members for this type of work.

This is a passionate group that has been successful so far and want to support the continued exploration.
I want to encourage the team to rework and resubmit based on the feedback.
