prop.description:
# Nouns Archive Expansion

![](https://i.imgur.com/7ldC7Dl.jpg)

---
### **TL;DR**
* [Nouns Archive](https://nounsarchive.wtf/) is an one-stop archive center which contain the creativity of NounsDAO's contestants and all the memes proliferations.
* We intend to continue to grow by integrating projects from all over the Nouns community and by introducing a streamlined landing page with upgraded visuals.
* 4 months of operation.
* 38.18 ETH requested.
* Nouns Archive Expansion Mockup - [TRY ME NOW!](https://xd.adobe.com/view/0e080238-8b33-4a6b-9135-db84ea8a9963-5b5b/?fullscreen&hints=off)

---

### **Introduction**

Hello **NounsDAO**,

I'm **Voadz**, one of the Nouncillors. Periodically, I've seen a tonne of contests hosted by our nounish communities such as [coloring book contests](https://nounsarchive.wtf/portfolio/nounsense-02) by Noun22 & Messhup, [memes contests](https://nounsarchive.wtf/portfolio/noadz-valentines-day) by Noadz, and is now mainly being held by the [Noun Square](https://twitter.com/thenounsquare) team. We have seen full of delightful contest submissions with all sorts of genres from all across the world.

I took an initiative to build a website where we can display all of the entries from NounsDAO's contestants because I personally feel it is very important for the DAO to do so. Additionally, it provides access to all future possibilities. 

As time passes, I feel it needs to grow even more by including all of the Nouns projects from the community and not only the contestants. Our memes proliferations are all contained inside.

Why is it important to document and archive these things?

> "The body continuously explores time and space. It holds our history, if we listen closely." -Chloe Chotrani

![](https://i.imgur.com/aDIU2rB.jpg)

---

### **Summary**

* **Long-term Vision** ; 
    * To retain past and future historical key data of all talented builders & artists that contribute around Nouns ecosystem.

* **Objective** ; 
    * 1) To help **onboard newcomers** that are interested in Nouns so they can catch a **glimpse** of what the project is all about. Navigation will be improved through enhanced visual design to create a stronger first impression.
    * 2) **References that act as inspiration**. Drawing from references is beneficial because it provides our imaginations with tangible things to model after.
    * 3) To create potential opportunity for artists / builders to receive **commissions or collaborative works/projects** with others.

* **Strategy** ; 
    * 1) **Simplified TL;DR / streamlined landing page with upgraded visuals** consists of ; *to browse relevant areas & specific parameters* ;
            * simplified projects/contests brief
            * project owner/hosts
            * total funded/prizes
            * categories (*ex; art, community, tech, marketing, physical etc*)
            * links to discourse/full props/related infos/contests
            * social media (*ex; twitter, discord*)
            * tags / filters *(most recent, oldest, alphabetically)*
            * distinct project images with descriptions
            * status
            * contest winners
            * CC0 label together with proof of CC0 (*ex; toggle/submit forms etc*)
            * search bar with data points
            *( all are shown under **Details**)*

    * 2) **Coordinate with other existing platforms** already in place (ex. ***[nouns.center](https://nouns.center/), [proposal.wtf](https://maty-eth.notion.site/maty-eth/NounsDAO-Proposals-Overview-b8c76e6ac8e44515966ee032ea20f860), [nounish](https://twitter.com/nounish)***) by pooling resources & efforts for maximum efficiency and also to complement each other.
    * 3) **Contents sustainability** ; we will be using Notion for the database and will be publically viewable. Content submission form with formats will be available for community use. An additional idea is to work with Nouns AI team for data scraping by using certain hashtags/keywords *(to be discuss)*.
    * 4) **CC0 Contents & Icon** ; any artist can **enable or declare** their work to be CC0 by submitting forms that will be made available soon. It is freely usable by anyone for remixing and other creative purposes. A "CC0" icon will appear that contains additional proof of CC0.
    * 5) A **daily dose of nounish things** ; daily curated posting of one random nounish project to give more **visibility & brand consistency** for long term goals.
    * 6) Main whiteboard to organise works ; [Nouns Archive's FigJam](https://www.figma.com/file/g1etPE6nK6WtwK35i9C8gs/Nouns-Archive?node-id=0%3A1).

![](https://i.imgur.com/YtMFFYJ.jpg)

* **Measuring Success** ; 
    * 1) We are tracking using Google Analytics and will factor in a monthly report & insights of the website.
    * 2) As per *image* attached, it is an event count for 2 months. 
    * 3) Organic views and engagements will always be the baseline metrics, but currently, **85%** of the contents are exclusively focus on contest entries. We anticipate that the graph will eventually be higher once we have completed building an MVP jointly across all nounish projects.
![](https://i.imgur.com/C8Iu47E.png)


* **Deliverables** ; 
    * 1) Empower existing website, [nounsarchive.wtf](https://nounsarchive.wtf/) as per whole new concept interface attached above.
    * 2) **On-the-go** website with comprehensive materials, including numerous projects and submissions.
    * 3) As per said under ***Strategy***.
    * 4) Biweekly reports and updates on new developments on discourse & social media (*twitter & discord*). Planning to search for other new platform that is suitable to use.

* **What we have delivered** ; 
    * 1) [Nouns Archive Center Website](https://nounsarchive.wtf/) - Funded by [NSFW Team](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/nsfw-nouns-archive-center/2413)
            * total artworks uploaded ; **1xxx artworks**
            * total artist contributed ; **2xx artists**
            * all datas are based on Notion.
    * 2) Whole new concept interface for [Nouns Archive Expansion in XD format](https://xd.adobe.com/view/0e080238-8b33-4a6b-9135-db84ea8a9963-5b5b/?fullscreen&hints=off) for testing.

---

### **Details**

![](https://i.imgur.com/x6i81pe.png)

![](https://i.imgur.com/eQqnByu.png)

![](https://i.imgur.com/dA2iJFW.jpg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/huA5DvG.jpg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/bIOM3V5.png)

![](https://i.imgur.com/pLOUw0L.jpg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/2GmWOIG.jpg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/tMBYNAk.jpg)

---

### **Team**

* [**Voadz**](https://twitter.com/thevoadz)
    * Full-time building on Nouns (*Oct 21-Now*)
    * Nouncillor
    * UI / UX + 3D
    * Building [Noun O'Blocks](https://twitter.com/NounOBlocks)
    * Active members of [NounsMY](https://twitter.com/NounsMY)
* [**Nero One**](https://twitter.com/0xNeroOne)
    * Exploring [3D, VJ, Mograph, XR, Creative Coding, NFT, DAO](https://nero1.link/)
    * Building [DinoNouns ( Interactive On-Chain NFT)](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/nsfw-dinonouns-interactive-on-chain-nft/2642)

---

### **Period of Engagement**

* 4 months : 15 December 2022 > 15 April 2023

---

### **Budget Breakdown**

For 4 months deliverables & operation ;

![](https://i.imgur.com/upRP1DX.png)

You will notice an increase in the amount asked *(NSFW)*, mainly due to building it *full-time* & the increased *workloads (including extra working hours)*. You can refer under ***Strategy & Deliverables***.

*Rate ; 1 ETH = $1,100 USD,*
**Total ETH amount requested from NounsDAO: 38.18 ETH ( Total USDC: $42,000 )**

* **25.45 ETH** - Voadz
* **12.73 ETH** - Nero One

All funds will be held in a multi-sig wallet that will initiate the following transactions:

* Convert ETH to $42,000 USDC ($210 for txn fees)
* Paid via 0xSplits stream (until the end of April)

This budget will be governed by Voadz & Nero One and controlled by a 2/2 multi-sig.
*0xdd7e4d8A5FEF6702F7e9C5B45dB440ba7a6e00c0*

---

### **Notes**

![](https://i.imgur.com/FJgalEQ.png)

Our small grants contract will no longer be in effect by the **end of November 22**. We are committed to continue working on this, we intend to use the remaining time efficiently to solicit input and suggestions & finding sponsors while concurrently making changes to this prop and submit for on-chain.

Thanks.
Voadz ⌐◨-◨

votes.reason: Navigating prop creation and DAO governance isn't a core competency of most potential contributors. An effort like this should make DAO funding more accessible to competent builders.
I absolutely love this! There’s so much amazing nounish content out there and having a place like this to view it all is epic. ⌐◨-◨

Results: 

How should Nouncil vote: 43 YES, 1 NO, 2 ABSTAIN

3 Nouncillors abstained from the decision.

--- Discussion from Nouncil Discord ---
--- (https://discord.gg/nouncil) ---

CHEFFO ⌐◧-◧
"The Archive is important and will hold so much beautiful art and stories."

Joel Cares
"This prop feels necessary and I would be excited to browse through all of this art regularly.
Oh - and the website is great, but I'd also love if the Notion DB was publically viewable, so I could sort and query and explore right from that."

heyjeff.eth
"I love this idea overall - i think it's needed in the ecosystem."

Bigshot Klim
"I  love this idea and the interface is sweet"

This kind of repository is really badly needed. The nouns community creates so much UGC (user-generated content) and currently, it is all scattered to the wind on Twitter and other socials. I think the flywheel benefits of this kind of fan art that is so common in our community is greatly diminished by the fact that it is so difficult to find easily (and therefore difficult for other artists to find inspiration, remix existing pieces, etc.) Ask seems reasonable for the amount of work involved, and the builder (Voadz) has proven himself on previous proposals.
nom nom Nouns...serve that CC0 on a platter please
We ❤️ Voadz ⌐◨-◨
valuable tool. looking forward to the upgrade.
Voadz thanks for the 69.9e for my vote 🦓

prop.description:
# Nouns funding ZachXBT

[@ZachXBT](https://twitter.com/zachxbt) is a public good serving the crypto ecosystem through tireless research exposing [countless scams](https://investigations.notion.site/). Recent events have highlighted the dire need and importance of such work. This prop proposes to fund 100 ETH to their donation address: zachxbt.eth (address can be verified from their twitter profile).

Donations have always been somewhat controversial within Nouns governance. [Prop 21](https://nouns.wtf/vote/21) donating 169 ETH to Gitcoin grants was one of the most contentious votes in our early history. [Prop 108](https://nouns.wtf/vote/108) donating 500 ETH to Ethereum protocol development (via the Protocol Guild) was much more unanimous but still there was discomfort and discourse around whether the DAO was becoming "a tax inefficient way for DAO members to make donations." 

I agree that we shouldn't resort to becoming a complacent vehicle of passive philanthropy. We should instead aim to actively contribute and be a net producer of public goods ourselves such that our meme (brand) can fully capture the provenance value (claim on originality of) the public work and thus leverage the virtuous cycle to do more than what capital alone could have done. However, there should be exceptions to this rule if there is an urgent and common public cause that warrants highlighting. I would like to suggest that this is such a case. Crypto needs more validators like ZachXBT.

With donations we need to be extra wary of conflicts of interest or self-dealing. Unfortunately there is no way to prove this cryptographically, but I attest that I have no prior (or planned future) relationship with ZachXBT and that today was the first time I contacted them (via twitter) to ask for their permission to make this proposal.

votes.reason: I'm all for props supporting folks doing good, calling out the bad, and self-regulating the industry, in order to advance things in our crazy corner of the world.

I strongly agree that @ZachXBT is a public good serving the crypto ecosystem. Nouns DAO signaling that we as an organization strongly value this type of work and want to encourage more people to perform their own due diligence and share is publicly feels Nounish. I don’t think Zach needs to acknowledge or brand anything with noggles for this to be a worth while contribution to our space.
he's the goat

On September 6, Zach tweeted "Really am unsure how much longer I can continue doing this. It’s been fun but burnout is a real thing and it has taken a toll on other aspects of my life [...] To give even more context one single person operates this account, answers DMs, and does the research [...] balancing this isn’t sustainable."

If funding his important work exposing grifters and scammers helps to alleviate that burnout and allow him to continue providing this public good for the ETH ecosystem, that will be very nounish imo.
I love this. Would love to see Nouns funding more people like this.
https://twitter.com/niftynaut/status/1599544045147021312
First time voting in a while. I support this 100%
yes

---

**Nouncil Vote Results**

---

43 Yes, 12 No, 3 Abstain

3 Nouncillors abstained from the decision

---

**Vote Reasons & Discussion**

---

**Benbodhi**
*"ZachXBT does amazing work and has a solid crypto audience. Probably wise to help fund him for the benefit of the space and some cross promo to his audience."*

**JoshuaFisher**
*"supporting good works is Nounish"*

**profwerder**
*"This needs more work & development. What are the deliverables? How does this proliferate the meme? Why not support 0xquit or foobar? Why him? I don’t think that has been explained in this prop OR any support for this particular person’s qualifications.  Not fully against this but thats a lot of eth on a vague prop."*

**Sasquatch**
*"zachxbt goat"*

**Don**
*"Zach is a the crypto community's version of super heroes! Easy yes."*

**Brook**
*"- i wish there was more clarity in the proposal
- what sort of precedent does it set for others like zach? for example, do nouners up and fund another person who is doing something similar? 
- it would be nice to hear back from zach about this proposal. his last tweet was on Nov 29, 2022 - it wasn't about this proposal.
- what was the rationale behind determining the amount?

^^^ all things that should be thought about as we move forward funding Public Goods / Persons."*

**Mach**
*"zach does great work, will love to continue supporting it"*


**ThaSwami**
*"Not enough information provided that clearly defines the use of funds"*

**JoelCares**
*"Hell ya - would be proud to support Zach's work."*

**RyanMac ⌐◨-◨**
*"ZachXBT is the Michael Jordan of uncovering crypto grifers & scammers. I’ve followed his work for a long time & he works off donations. About 3 months ago he almost quit bc he was making zero revenue & mentally taxed. The space needs more ZachXBTs bc we have so many bad actors right under our noses. This is a 100% yes vote on my end: hopefully this helps him add more players to his roster"*

**Mindtoasted**
*"This is quite a big amount, but from how detailed Zach investigated and exposed several projects in the past this could be a good new insight for Nouns. Lately I personally follow several influential Twitter figures who provide concrete information both good and bad in the crypto space, in fact we need people like this so I vote yes."*

**Graphic.⌐◨-◨**
*"Looking through Twitter I see a lot of examples of Zach exposing a lot of bad actors in the space. This helps many people stay away from scams."*

**0xFloyd**
*"huge supporter of this - tweeted about it. i view this as a crypto public good in a sense. and its obviously super crypto native. overall great decision.

if Nouns would continue to do these types of props in the future tho, i wonder if a smaller amount becomes more standard. for example, i think 50 eth would largely have the same effect"*

**nick**
*"Zach's work is super important. Think this is a great idea. Public good for all"*

**CHEFFO ⌐◧-◧**
*"I am not very familiar with this builder, but I do think the space needs white hats and the nouns could experiment with funding this as public good."*


---

**Nouncil Discord**

---

For more Nouns DAO proposal discussion join us here: https://discord.gg/nouncil
nom nom investigation ⌐◨-◨

prop.description:
# Explorer Grants - Trial

![image](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/optimized/2X/b/be6270ef4049c16180cde5177b5c21ac878d1b7b_2_690x431.png)

# Explorer Grants - Trial

**Core Issue:** A lot of talented builders have Nouns on their radar, but are not sure how to contribute. The only place we actively incentivize them with ideas and funding is Prop House mandated rounds, which are retroactive, leaving builders who lose the round uncompensated for their work. Otherwise, they must figure out problems themselves and then ask for money, a difficult process if someone has no connections to the ecosystem.

**Solution:** Create a program to actively recruit new talented builders and pro-actively fund them to explore the Nouns ecosystem.

### TL;DR
* 1 grant = 10 ETH for 2 months of exploration, goal for each builder is to have an on-chain prop by end of the period
* 5 builders (50 ETH total) in first trial run
* 3 members on operations team (mrtn, jihad, dot), lightly compensated; 2 more on multi-sig (yitong and krel)
* Transparency is key

### Eligibility
- Must NOT be actively or recently funded by Nouns, or clearly an existing participant in the Nouns ecosystem
- Must be new to the broader Nouns ecosystem
- Must be working / actively exploring _something_ directly related to NounsDAO while on grant, or it will be revoked
- Preference for people who can proactively create independently — particularly engineers, but also content creators, designers, writers, etc

### Operation Details
The entire process will be transparent via a public Discord and run by the 3-person team, who will be lightly compensated to do this work, ensuring accountability and commitment. Our initial proposal had no funding for the team, but we were recommended otherwise by Nouners.

**Public Application:**
* Explorer Grants will be publicized via Twitter, 1:1 outreach from the team and its network, Twitter Spaces with Nouns community organizations, Discords, etc
* Candidates will submit public applications, showing past work and motivations for exploring the Nouns ecosystem, as well as a couple problem spaces that interest them
  * These applications will also benefit the community at large who can recruit builders from this group
* Candidates will largely be assessed on talent, potential, and excitement about Nouns. Reasoning for accepted candidates will be made public. The 3-person team will decide on 4 final candidates to accept.
* 1 slot in the program will be allocated to a Nouns community vote

**Program:**
* 10 ETH for 2 months of part-time exploration for each builder
  * *Detail: Overpaying slightly is critical to attracting talent that may not otherwise come to us. We are targeting people who make more than $150,000 a year in their full-time job*
* Weekly check-in call with builders. Members of the Explorer Grants team will help them explore ideas, connect them to Nouners and builders, and lead workshops
* **End of Program Objective:** each builder submits an on-chain or Prop House prop for continued funding

### Team
* **mrtn, lead organizer:**
    * Previously a PM at Google and NBA Top Shot, he has now contributed to a variety of Nounish projects - Nouns Builder, AI Pod, Agora, as well as doing a 24 Hour Nounish live stream, and receiving a Governance Historian grant. At USC, he ran an organization that guided students towards entrepreneurship, whose members include several YC startups. He's a big believer in diversifying funding sources for Nouns builders, and experimenting with the patronage model. *Comp: 3 ETH / month*
* **jihad, community & product expert:**
    * Core contributor at Forefront, creating media and building infrastructure for tokenized communities. He is also a delegate and “Lil Nouncilor” at Lil Nouns DAO, a contributor to Public Nouns, one of the winners of the recent Nouns Agora delegate race, and is part of the team building [Adjectives](nouns.terminal.co), an analytics and proposal evaluation platform for Nouns DAO. Jihad believes that Nouns must be a center of excellence for tokenized communities, and the Explorer Grants program would be a step in the right direction in attracting the brightest minds to do focused yet unstructured work in the Nouns ecosystem. *Comp 2 ETH / month*
* **dot, technical expert:**
    * Dot is an iOS dev turned nounish builder - a founding member of Nouncil and most recently Lil Nounder at Lil Nouns DAO; the first full fork of Nouns DAO. Dot started Lil Nouns as a way to expose nouns to as many people as possible. Lil Nouns DAO leverages its 8 nouns alongside its own treasury to fund and support public goods built by lil nouners. In doing so, Lil Nouns has become a builder onramp to Nouns DAO itself. *Comp: 2 ETH / month*

***We will use a 3 of 5 multi-sig, with the core team members as well as krel and yitong.***

### Questions
**How will you actually find these builders?** Our team has fairly deep networks within the crypto and broader tech space; we'll leverage our personal connections as well as our social media presence to find more builders. Additionally, a large appeal of programs like these (Thiel Fellowship, Prop House, MacArthur Grants) is the benefit of continued funding + prestige, which we intend to lean into.

**But what if the builders don't do anything?** This is similar to everything in Nouns already - there's a social contract to uphold, someone could always dissapear after receiving 200 ETH on-chain. We can setup the grant via Sablier to revoke if a builder goes MIA, however.

**What will they actually build?** The first round will not have a particular mandate but future ones could be structured closer to Prop House mandated rounds, where there is a theme. We believe that time and freedom is key to allowing talented builders to find something meaningful to build long-term.

**Why not just run this on Prop House?** Decisions are not always best made by large committees. Prop House rounds do not allow for deep conversation and analysis of candidates. A transparent, small committee allows for depth and betting on candidates who might not otherwise get a shot (i.e. people who aren't good at writing a description on prop house but would be amazing builders). Additionally, we'd like to create a long-term relationship with these builders via an organized cohort.

**What if no good work comes out of this?** That's a possibility, as is the case with prop house rounds. However, we believe that Nouns already has a great enough brand to attract solid builders. However, if nothing goods comes out of this trial, then we will have learned that pro-active grants for attracting builders is not a valid technique for our DAO. If there are takeaways, they can be adapted into other funding sources, like Prop House or NSFW in the future.

**Why are you being paid?** Our initial proposal did not include payment for the team, but it was suggested by Nouners that we should be getting paid to create accountability, as well as allow us to dedicate more time in making this more of a full-fledged program than one-off grants with no support from us.

### Total Funding
5 Builders x 10 ETH = 50 ETH
Team Comp: 14 ETH
Total: 64 ETH

***Questions? Contact mrtn on Discord (mrtn#7388) or Twitter ([@anquetil](https://twitter.com/anquetil))***

votes.reason: These are the types of programs we need to onboard excellent builders to the Nouns ecosystem (and crypto broadly).
Always in favor of supporting builders and expanding the pool of Nounish builders.

Imo this team is well equip to deliver on this objective, and I still firmly believe having someone immersed in the ecosystem/process of getting a prop from idea to on chain can be invaluable to a new builder who may be overwhelmed or confused with how to navigate. Id also personally like to volunteer to send builders their way to try and maximize the output this team delivers 🤝

This is a low cost, asymmetric upside experiment being run by a Nounish team. This team has proven their thoughtfulness through previous work, so in the worst case it will be a great learning experience for the DAO on how to better run these programs.
Seems like less useful NSFW/Prop-house
Abstaining to avoid any potential conflicts of interest, as Martin is also a part time paid contributor to Agora, and because I'm moderating the Agora Townhall debate on this proposal.

was a bit unsure about the operating team but got more comfortable after dm-ing with mrtn a bit. I have reasonable faith that this group can be good reps of the dao. as for the model itself, there's kind of a clear way we'll evaluate the success / failure at the end which I like. it will entirely depend on how I feel about the 5 net new builders this grant program onboarded and their quality & retention.
I'm a supporter of experimenting with different ways of distributing the treasury.

Although I like the idea of pods for fund distribution, I cannot vote for this prop as is. 
- targeting >150k earners seems very narrow-minded to me, excluding a lot of talent
- builders will be paid 5 eth/month to then apply to prop house? and get 2 eth? or wait for a bigger prop house for similar funding?
There are some issues that should be addressed to make sure best results are achieved.
https://twitter.com/niftynaut/status/1600222829584125952

**Nouncil Vote Results**

31 Yes, 13 No, 0 Abstain

5 Nouncillors abstained from the decision

**YES WINS**

---

**Vote Reasons**

---

**andrewladdusaw** *"Seems like a no-brainer. Great team, great mission, overhead far below the norm for capital allocation in the rest of the community. Easy yes for me."*

**profwerder** *"Agree —great team and seems like a good trial run but I think the team should have included more comp for themselves. This is going to be more work than you may realize. Love the experiment!"*

**Bigshot Klim** *"no brainer for me too"*

**CHEFFO ⌐◧-◧** *"this prop is good. it will attract high level talent with a clear on-boarding and application process. the numbers are clear and proportional, the team comps are correct. can't wait to see what is built.

CHEFFO = YES"*

**shad_0** *"it’s a lovely idea!"*

**fiveoceans_dev** *"I vote for this proposal because I believe there should be competition for best allocation of treasury. The team is nounish and I trust that they will do a good job."*

**Bigshot Klim** *"We need more ways to keep new builders engaged and learn as they go in this space"*

**Joel Cares** *"Fully support experiments in on-boarding new builders."*

**Mach** *"seems like something that could be done and reward retroactive funding instead of active comp"*

**BENJAMIN LATSKO ⌐◧-◧** *"I think it's a fun experiment. But not convinced it's something sustainable and scalable. I also don't see how it will actually benefit the flywheel dynamics"*

**Graphic.⌐◨-◨** *"Looks like a great way to bring in new established creatives into the nouns ecosystem!"*

---

For more Nouns DAO proposal discussion head to the Nouncil Discord: https://discord.gg/nouncil

core issue is talented builders with nouns on their radar, but this prop is targeting people new to the ecosystem?

I also don't think the process to ask for money is difficult without connections to the ecosystem -- if an idea/prop is truly compelling it will get the attention of the DAO (ex: salvino lux glasses)

not very scalable, we can't afford to pay more and more people $6400 USD/month just to think about nouns part time -- and if we are going to start paying select people to think about nouns, should we be paying new builders to force them to care about nouns vs proven and passionate community members? should gami or i be getting paid to think about future nouns props?

appreciate the focus on transparency, but with this being yet another discord in the nouns ecosystem it is a tough ask to join another server just to keep up to date with a single proposal
I've seen martin's name on a number of props and am not satisfied with his level of contribution to the nouns ai team thus far.

Not mad on this proposal. Largely in agreement with this https://twitter.com/niftynaut/status/1600222829584125952?s=20&t=p1Dr9BauQh9vuIM8dCpkvw

Essentially its paying the team (7 eth a month) to find and pay other people (5eth a month) to work part time to come up with proposals so we can fund them with more eth to do whatever they came up with? Directionally correct in the sense that im big time in favour of getting people outside of Nouns working on Nouns but i just dont think this has the right incentive structure, nor is it scalable and objectives are just not clear enough.
Sharks like the deep sea explorations…let’s see how the experimentation goes
I want to encourage the team to rework and resubmit based on the feedback.

I was back and forth on this proposal, to be honest. Love the energy of the builder (Martin) but wasn't sure about the format. But ultimately, I think he will do his best to try and find really great candidates for these "Nouns Fellowships", and I'm curious to see what good could come from it. If even one of their "recruits" produces an outsized impact, the ask will have been well worth it.  Also, I don't think Nouns is even close to being out of its experimentation stage yet (something the bear market has maybe caused us to forget.) So I'll vote For.

Disclosure: Martin isn't my friend, I've never met this man in my life, we don't cheer for the same sports teams, I would never drive the model of car he drives as his daily driver, and we are members of separate political parties.
this is an interesting and worthwhile experiment to run. kudos to the team for taking the initiative on a new way to onboard talented folks into the nouniverse.

imho this prop feels directionally correct, but could have benefited from some additional refinement. Some suggestions include leaning into existing infra at the DAO like the Nounish Builders Discord and targeting talent outreach to areas the DAO is focused on, e.g. AI and front-end clients. Looking forward to greeting the new builders to the community!

prop.description:
# Worst Case Decision x Nouns - Episodic Video NFTs

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Bygv3XEIj.gif)

     
Hey Nouns DAO,

Artist and slapstick conceptualist [Marc Horowitz](http://1833marcive.com/) here, with a proposal to co-create a Nouns DAO-ified season of my new serialized NFT video collection, Worst Case Decision. It’s like Adult Swim on a dozen espresso shots, in one-minute-or-less episodes, released as 1/1 NFTs.

This is an opportunity to expand Nouns DAO culture by unleashing highly visible artist-created, community-developed CC0 video content that can be distributed everywhere. It’s also a brand-new way to use web3 tooling to release episodic videos, and an opportunity to pioneer a decentralized media production model that can help inform the future of entertainment. 
**takes a breath*

Read on and watch the below video to learn more.

[![Worst Case Decision](https://cdn.hashku.com/wcd/Nouns_WCD_Pitch_vid_screenshot_1500x.jpg)
](https://vimeo.com/772223496/a53f2e2dad "Worst Case Decision")


## What’s Worst Case Decision?
Worst Case Decision is maybe the first episodic “show” to be released as an NFT series.

Each season of WCD features 7 bite-sized fever dreams that are handcrafted into 30-70 second “episodes.” Every episode chases surreal characters along a bat-shit hyper-casual narrative that loosely follows a theme. So far we’ve explored themes such as “mayonnaise portal,” “everyone is wet,” “hi-fi asparagus rain,” and “too many cats,” to name a few.

The show’s vibe feels like surfing in a sea of technicolor absurdity, with a low-fi, internet-infused, stop-motion animation style. Video, painting, web3, DALL-E, comedy, commerce… WCD has it all. (Scroll to the bottom of this proposal to view sample episodes.)

**Worst Case Decision Quick Facts:**

* 50 Seasons planned, 7 episodes per season (350 episodes total)
* Episodes released episodically as 1/1 video NFTs via worstcasedecision.com
* Each season features an ever-changing cast of characters and collaborators
* NFTs can be purchased with credit card and digital currency (ETH)

## What makes this exciting for Nouns DAO?
We’re at the dawn of a new era for entertainment—one that will enable audiences and creators to build sustainable models of cultural production together. As perhaps the first-ever serialized 1/1 NFT video collection, Worst Case Decision is taking a pioneering approach to launching meme-y, weird, funny narrative shorts with and for the communities who believe this kind of art should exist in the world. 

Beyond pioneering this new web3-native episodic production model, there are a few specific benefits that Nouners can expect from supporting this project:

**Noun-ified Episodes**
The entire season will be built based on decentralized creative direction by opening up key decisions to the Nouners (and in some cases the internet at large, for max visibility). This includes community input/voting on:
* The “themes” of each episode
* Protagonists (I’ve got so many weird character ideas, man)
* Supporting cast (really, so many weird characters)
* Episode backgrounds

**CC0 Content & Nouns Memes**
The Nouns season of WCD will be entirely CC0. This means that anyone can meme the shit out of the entire season, which will be full of Nouns references, noggles, and other inside jokes specific to Nouns’ community, culture, and lore. Cut up and re-mix the episodes however y’all see fit, and post wherever you want.

**Additional Benefits to Nouns DAO**

1)	**Major marketing and PR exposure.** This is a first-of-its-kind video collection in the NFT space, and there’s “a lot of press to be had.”
2)	**WCD is planned for 50 seasons.** Nouns would be the 3rd season of 50, and the first-ever sponsored season—representing an early entry into supporting what could become a historic release.
3)	**Introduce Marc’s audience to Nouns.** I’ve been an independent artist for 25 years, and as a result I’m decently well known. I can help bring the fine art world’s attention to Nouns and web3 at large.
4)	**Reach non-web3-savvy folks, too.** Our tech partner [Hashku](https://hashku.com) has both crypto-native and custodial credit card minting solutions, meaning that non-crypto folks can participate in NFT auctions.

![](https://cdn.hashku.com/wcd/nouns_pfp_collage%20copy_sm.jpg)

These are just mere examples of potential Nouns x WCD characters! Glorious, yes? Please feel free to take ‘em and make ‘em [your PFPs](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Ff52SL1p3PGzdxYtCO7kyA9kpE2N4EAY?usp=share_link). (Shhhh…. there will be plenty more via https://nouns.build/ in the future.) 

## What makes this exciting for Collectors?
I care immensely about my collectors. I want to add value and make the experience as fun and engaging as the episodes themselves. We have an expansive vision and are thrilled to include our collectors along this journey. 

If you are a holder of a WCD episode from any season, you’ll get access to:

* My network via a private discord channel for collectors (a seat on the board so to speak)
* Input on IRL WCD events
* Early access to future WCD collabs and projects  

## Marketing & Community Development
Our philosophy for marketing and PR follows the vision for the project. Simply put: Our weird creative vision and IRL performances are going to cause some really interesting responses, which we’ll engage with using our built-in strengths with social media and PR.

**Marketing Plan**

* **Launch activities** – Our team will produce strategic content and a mix of online and IRL activations to generate as much pre-launch awareness as possible. We have an existing list of interested & interesting media partners to engage here. The web3 PR agency Serotonin is among them.
*  **High-velocity engagement** – A dedicated Project Ambassador will act as a marketing strategist, online social maestro, and Nouns champion, using multi-channel engagement tactics to build momentum. 

* **Partnerships & sponsorships** – I (Marc) have a long history of partnering with brands to co-create projects. We will be bringing on some truly exciting collaborators and sponsors to spread the word even farther.

* **Long-term community growth** – Our desire is to make this project fully self-sustaining. To do this, our goal is to increase the performance of NFT auctions and overall engagement with the series by aggressively growing the WCD community. 

* **Transparent success metrics** – We will track and analyze meaningful engagement metrics to keep the community informed on how we’re doing, and to strengthen our marketing approaches overall.

## Open-Sourcing Our Promo Strategy

We wish to be as transparent as possible with our learnings about marketing and running this project. We’ll create a public document outlining our goals, metrics, successes, and learnings so that our efforts can help future projects and the community at large.

## Project Team

In addition to an amazing lineup of advisors, our core team currently consists of the following:

**Marc Horowitz** // Creator & Visionary 
**Chris Coy** // Partner & Spiritual Advisor 
**Damien Newman** // Creative Consultant & Power Supporter 
**Matt Casanova** // Builder of Technologies
**Hashku** // Minting Platform

## Budget
Anticipated activities and budgets (by phases):

* **Pre-Production** – $9,650
Studio usage, lighting equipment, episode concepting/ production planning for all 7 episodes, props, backgrounds, art department (hand making all the noggles and weird other props).

* **Production** – $16,875 
Director fee, cinematographer/camera operator fee, additional creative direction and shoot crew/collaborators, daily incidentals during shoot (food, grip, etc), and production assistance.

* **Post-Production** – $11,500 
Sound finishing/sfx/sound design, music licensing, editing, smart contract customizations for specific season NFTs, season-specific website costs (video bandwidth and hosting). 

* **Promotion of Nouns + WCD Season (Outreach/Marketing/PR)** – $17,475
Spread the word about the Nouns DAO and its sponsored season of WCD via strategic editorial write ups, podcast appearances, live events, IRL media stunts/performances, and other activations TBD.  See further notes in “Marketing Plan” (above).


**Total Budget** ($55,500) + price contingency: **50 ETH** (converted to USDC immediately) 


## Timeline & Logistics

**Mid-late February, 2023:** Launch the project with unsponsored seasons 1 and 2.

**Mid-January:** Collaborate with the Nouns community. Using voting mechanisms and other means of gathering community input, we will collectively shape WCD season 3.

**Mid-late January:** Once our Nouns season is planned, each episode takes roughly 2 days to film and edit. That brings pre-production, production, and post-production to 3-4 weeks total.

## How NFT Auctions Will Work on worstcasedecision.com
Each season of WCD video episodes will be dropped over the course of a week (dates will be announced via [@marchorowitz](https://twitter.com/marchorowitz)).
* Each day at 9am PST a new episode will drop on worstcasedecision.com
* Each episode will be released as a 1/1 NFT 
* Each NFT’s auction will end at 8:55:59 am PST the following day
* When one auction closes, the next one drops—and this continues for 7 days in a row, Mon–Sun.

## The Future of WCD and Episodic NFTs
We have the team and vision required to evolve WCD into a genre-defining series. Beyond this, we think we’re onto something in regards to how serialized NFTs can be used as a sustainable model to fund the production of some truly weird and great videos—and other creations as well.

If you are interested in learning more and chatting with Marc and the team personally, please reach out and we’ll have a chat ;)

## Thank you, Nouners!
If I get the chance to collaborate with you all, I know we can make something really fun and amazing. If you have any questions, feel free to [dm](https://twitter.com/marchorowitz) me. 

Also, if you happen to be in the Swiss Crypto Valley, I’m in a show [@unpaired__](https://twitter.com/unpaired__) NFT IRL gallery through 12/02/22 w/ [Krista Kim](https://twitter.com/Krista_Kim), [Shavonne Wong](https://twitter.com/shavonnewong_), [Pak](https://twitter.com/muratpak), [Takashi Murakami](https://twitter.com/takashipom), [Pilar Zeta](https://twitter.com/pilar_zeta), [Nancy Baker Cahill](https://twitter.com/nbakercahill), [The Haas Brothers](https://twitter.com/TheHaasBrothers), and [Urs Fischer](https://twitter.com/CHAOSursfischer).

Much love to you all ✌🏼
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Hy7b2ZEUi.jpg)


# Sample Episodes

## Total Despair: Coffee Maker Fantasy (Season 1, Episode 3) 
After God rains down hi-fi asparagus and kills parrot, our crew gets to the bottom of why such a thing would happen.

[![Worst Case Decision](https://cdn.hashku.com/wcd/Total_Despair_1500x.jpg)
](https://vimeo.com/772224084/46fe908695 "Worst Case Decision")


## Sticky Resuscitation: Frog RomCom (Season 2, Episode 1)
Sometimes a bagel just isn't worth it. Or is it the missing piece to a new romance?

[![Worst Case Decision](https://cdn.hashku.com/wcd/Sticky_Resuscitation_1500.jpg)
](https://vimeo.com/772225011/97801037a7 "Worst Case Decision")


## Night Terrors: Saint Bernard Sci-fi (Season 4, Episode 3)
Saint Bernard's friend didn't take his night meds again :0 

[![Worst Case Decision](https://cdn.hashku.com/wcd/Night_Terrors_1500x.jpg)
](https://vimeo.com/772225676/dde584ff43 "Worst Case Decision")


## Dull Existence: Carlos Tragedy (Season 7, Episode 2)
Carlos's friend Hank is always bored. Not today! Avocado makes his debut.

[![Worst Case Decision](https://cdn.hashku.com/wcd/Dull_Existence.jpg)
](https://vimeo.com/772226353/d4440b962d "Worst Case Decision")



**Relevant Links**
http://1833marcive.com/
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marc_Horowitz
https://deboergallery.com/marchorowitz 

**Some Press about Marc**
[The Aesthetics of Stability](https://www.lofficielstbarth.com/art/the-aesthetics-of-stability) (L’Officiel)

prop.description:
# Nouns Stories: Short Shorts

![](https://i.imgur.com/mCy0tjV.png)


## TL;DR
A team of award-winning animators and executives in primetime animation have teamed up with Nouns Stories to commission 10 comedic Nouns shorts. 


---


## Short Shorts - Season 1

We're commissioning 10 shorts for 6 ETH each. 5 of the shorts will be commissioned through a Prop House round. We will hand pick, and noun pill, five of our favorite creators to complete the other 5 shorts.

**The Rules**
1. The short must be funny.
2. The short must be 15 seconds.
3. The short must feature at least one Noun.

Proposers will submit a portfolio (or at least one example of previous work) + a 1 sentence creative pitch for their short.

**Distribution**

Once the 10 shorts are complete we will plan for an entertaining online premiere, looking to collaborate with people in the Nouniverse, creators, and media outlets with established audiences. Then we will upload these to our own branded social media accounts and anywhere else on the internet that will showcase them. We will also provide the video files publically, allowing anyone to use them in future Nounish projects and news.

**Awards**

We have an additional 20 ETH to award as prizes. We'll experiment with a variety of prizes and allocation methods including token gated Nounish community votes, live celebrity critic votes, and somehow we're going to get Goldy's dog to choose one prize winner. Also included will be a prize specifically for the best CC0 shorts to incentivize creators to release their content CC0.

All of our these additional prizes will be open to public submissions - artists not selected and funded through Prop House can create their short anyways and have another shot at competing for the prizes.

**Branding**

10 ETH is included to cover basic branding needed for this Prop House round. This could include logos, a simple website, a Nouns Shorts video bumper to play between shorts, etc. We will return any ETH we do not use to the treasury.


---


## Who is Nouns Stories
**Stoopid Buddy**
8 time Emmy-winning studio behind Robot Chicken & Nouns Documentary

**Walter Newman**
SVP at Adult Swim overseeing such shows as Rick & Morty, Robot Chicken, Smiling Friends, Lazor Wulf + Adult Swim shorts.

**Pixel**
[Goldy's](https://twitter.com/Goldypix) Oscar Shortlisted hybrid production studio are behind [nounish ⌐◨-◨](https://twitter.com/nounish) and the soon-to-be-released  animated short film "[The Wizards Hat](https://twitter.com/nouns_stories/status/1570433066900017152?s=20&t=T_vYbAun_YQEsZUlEwfjSA)" from the original Nouns Stories proposal. 

**Joshua Fisher**
Creative manager, SharkDAO Rep, Ugly Noun, The Nouns Square Foundooor, NounsDAO Buildooor and Nouns narrative advocate.

**Joel Cares**
CEO of [Lobal Global](https://lobal.global/), video [Director](https://joelcares.net/), founding member of [Nouncil](http://nouncil.wtf/), creator of [Nerman](https://twitter.com/nermanbot).


---

## The Future
Season 1 is just the beginning. Nouns Stories will produce and release content through a Perpetual Original Content Machine that culminates in a robust animation and film ecosystem plus yearly Nouns Film Festival. 

Short Shorts Season 1 will give us a taste of what multi-hypenate creators can make with Nouns + inspire the next wave of storytellers to get involved for subsequent funding rounds.

![](https://i.imgur.com/wf8GaM0.jpg)

(above: imagining a world where there are countless high quality Nouns style animated works to share)


---

## Funding

**Total Budget: 90 ETH**
 - Prop House Shorts Round - 30 ETH
 - Team Commissioned Shorts - 30 ETH
 - Branding Elements - 10 ETH
 - Prizes - 20 ETH

**Admin Costs**
 - 0 ETH  - the team will forgo compensation in this pilot round

**Funding Sources:**
 - **27 ETH** from Nouns Stories:
Additional funds were left over from [Prop 20](https://nouns.wtf/vote/20). For more information see this [Post in Discord](https://discord.com/channels/849745721544146955/917252751140982885/1019989277997801512). TL;DR is Nouns Stories will deliver THE WIZARDS HAT and roll over the original funds into this new project.
- **10.69 ETH** from the Noundry Committee:
The Noundry Committee has generously decided to donate their reward from [Prop 147](https://nouns.wtf/vote/147) to help fund this round of shorts.
- **52.31 ETH** from Nouns DAO:
We are requesting the DAO match fund our existing funds to bring us to our total budget of ~90 ETH. 


The proposal requests a transfer 52.31 ETH to 0x35aa2666C8Bc0AEb68ea64B463Cf57a74bDbf977

prop.description:
# Nouns X Everybody

# TL;DR

This proposal will differentiate itself from other Nouns proposals aiming to create content for the Nouns (such as [165](https://nouns.wtf/vote/165), [113](https://nouns.wtf/vote/113) and [143](https://nouns.wtf/vote/143)) by focusing on creating an open process which will allow anyone to create a hype video.

While this prop is similar to [Prop 180](https://nouns.wtf/vote/180) , they are very different in their process, scope and goals. Nouns X Everybody is more about the process itself (which could be applied to other areas, not just content creation). Additionally, although this proposal pays more to the winning submissions - it is doing so because it requires the team to produce AND distribute without a guarantee of payment. While the number of views are not everything, they do matter, as we can have the highest quality content in the world but it only matters if people see it. 

Instead of determining what we think people will want to see, this proposal will instead outline the guidelines in terms of output as well as the minimum result we want achieved in terms of outcome. Leaving it open for anyone to implement their own creative process in order to achieve that result.

By funding this the proposal we would hope to achieve the goals of:


* Having a minimum of 10 pieces of original video content created, each with a minimum of 2k views on YouTube (20k total views minimum but I would expect much much more).
* Getting new and innovative ideas from both from within and outside of our existing community by allowing them creative control on the output.
* Bringing people into the Nouniverse as they will need to learn more about Nouns so as to create content which will enable them to win this challenge.
* Showcase how the various elements of the DAO (see: ‘The Process’) can be combined to create a cohesive process for project implementation.
* Demonstrating a proposal process that brings benefit to the DAO and rewards creators while not requiring compensation for the proposer. With 86% going to content creators, 12% going to marketing and just 1% going to administration along with 1% earmarked for an independent report on effectiveness of the proposal after 9 months. 


---
 
 

# THE BRIEF

**Create a short hype video that either explains or pulls people into the Nouniverse and if your video gets over 2k views on YouTube before April 30th 2023 you could be awarded part of the $200k fund.**

The **Top 10 Videos** ranked by number of YouTube views that meet the minimum entry requirements below will be put up for a vote where **4 winners** will be selected and awarded **$50k each**.

* Any person or team is free to submit an entry to this challenge. 
* To enter, simply create your video, upload it to YouTube and get people to watch it.

___

_**MINIMUM QUALIFYING CRITERIA**_ 

- Has more than 2000 organic views on Youtube by the end of the Submission Period
- Must meet the brief (i.e. It either ‘explains the Nouns’ or ‘pulls people into the Nouniverse’)
- Content must be original. While videos may reuse existing content if it is not mostly original it will not qualify.
- Is positive in nature and is rated PG
- Must be a video and not a YouTube "shorts"
- Should include ‘#EnterTheNouniverse’ in the description (so we can easily filter submissions)


---

Complete creative freedom is given to entrants on how they want to achieve the goal – it can be animated, live footage, a mixture of both or something completely different. Some teams might focus on higher end productions that explains Nouns to people while others might focus on something simple and unique that pulls people into the Nouniverse (i.e. see the different approach[ Coinbase](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uJ9pNQrz0fA&ab_channel=AnthonyKalamut) had vs other cypto companies during the superbowl in trying to achieve the same result). It is up to the creator to do what they think will work.



---
 

## SELECTION CRITERIA

The **Top 8 Videos with the most views on YouTube + 2 Videos chosen by the Selection Committee** will be entered into the Voting Round – where Noun holders will vote for the 4 winners of $50k each.



* All videos must meet the minimum qualification criteria
* Selected entries will be free to provide any additional information at this stage to be included in their entry which demonstrates why their content should win (for example, data from other social media platforms like Twitter, TikTok or any other measure of engagement)
* Selected entries may be asked to provide information to the selection committee proving that their YouTube views were organic that the data has not been manipulated or paid for.
* A person/team can submit as many entries as they want but only their best entry (which they can choose)  will be selected for the final vote.
* We are including 2 videos selected by the committee due to the fact that some entries may not be in the Top 10 in terms of views of YouTube but may have merit for nomination through a disproportionate level of engagement on other channels and/or be of exceptional quality or have uploaded their video late in the process but has gained a lot of views in a short time period.
---
 
 

# THE PROCESS

If this proposal is successful, the following process will take place:



1. **Proposal Passes:** $200k and 25 Eth with be transferred to a multisig controlled by the Multisig. The challenge has officially started.
2. **Submission Period:** There is a 5 Month window for anyone to create and publish their hype video.
3. **Create Marketing Dept:** 25 Eth will immediately be used to fund a Prop House Round with 5 Eth being awarded to the 5 best proposals detailing how they will market and find entrants for this project. (see note at bottom)
4. **Selection Period:** When the submission period has ended on April 30th 2023 there will be a 2 week selection period where the creators of the Top 10 videos will be invited by the Selection Committee to make their submissions. These submissions, including any additional information the creator wants to provide, will be uploaded to a Prop House round by the Selection Committee.The selection committee will be paid 3 eth for administering this.
5. **Voting Round:** Nouns will have a 1 week voting period to cast their votes for the 4 winning submissions to be awarded $50k each.
6. **Payment:** Funds will be distributed to the Winners by the Trusted Parties.
7. **Analysis**: 2 eth will be earmarked for an indpedent evaluation of this proposal after 9 months. To see how effective it was at achieving the stated outcome. 

_**Important Note:** If no one meets the minimum qualifying criteria, the Nouns pay nothing (with the exception of the 25 eth used to fund the marketing dept prop house round) and all funds are returned to the Treasury. But for every person or team that does meet the criteria, we have at the very least a piece of original video content with more that 2k views on YouTube._ 




** **

**Selection Committee:** The Selection committee will be comprised of 5 independent members of the Noun community, selected by Hindsight, whose job it will be: (a) select the Top 10 videos to be included in the final Noun vote as per the minimum qualifying criteria and the selection criteria above, (b) contact these creators to submit any additional information for the final vote and (c) upload those submissions to a Prop House vote.

The work of the selection committee is minimal and mostly administrative (checking that views are organic etc) and as such will only require 3 eth (of which I will get none).

_In order to maintain independence and to ensure a fair process members of the selection committee cannot enter a video to the challenge_


---

**Stated Goals of this Proposal** 
If this proposal passes, it success or failure will be measured against meeting the following criteria:
* The creation of a minimum of 10 pieces of good quality, original content before April 30th
* A minimum of 100k cumulative organic YouTube views across all content created in persuit of this prize before 9 months of this proposal passing
___



**Team** 
Really the point of this prop is that there is no 'team' but for the interest of transparency and to include a section I think should be in all props:
* Hindsight: I am not a member of any other teams, councils or projects and I do not receive any compensation from any DAO source. I have no conflicts of interest and will not financially benefit from this proposal.
* My only role will be to be on the multisig and to choose the selection commitee (A role I would be happy to give to someone else if they are suitable and want it!)


---

**Transaction Details**



* 30 Eth will be transferred to fund a Prop House Round to create a marketing team for the challenge, the selection committee administration cost and the retrospective report on outcome.
* $200k USD will be transferred to fund the prize pool.

_If less than 4 teams do not meet the minimum qualifying criteria then any USDC that has not been used will be returned to the treasury._

**Total Cost:** $200k + 30 Eth

**Multisig**

The multisig is a 3/5 consisting of the 5 best looking members of the dao

* [Hindsight](https://twitter.com/0Hindsight)
* [Elad](https://twitter.com/eladmallel)
* [Jarmen](https://twitter.com/jarmen43)
* [Maty](https://twitter.com/matyETH)
* [Adrianmcli](https://twitter.com/adrianmcli)

___

**A note on the 'Marketing Dept' creation**


The prop house round for 25 eth will award 5 submissions 5 eth to market this challenge and try and find people and teams outside both inside and outside of Nouns to make submissions. I will draft the prop house round if this proposal succeeds. An idea of submissions that will be encouraged are: contacting media schools, creating a landing pages with instructions, engaging with influencers to promote etc. 

___


**Why YouTube Views**


As stated earlier, YouTube views are not everything, but they do matter and after looking at the view count of Nouns content I think we could benefit from a proposal with a proposal that has goals in terms of distribution as well as production. 

Many of these videos will have more views on Twitter and other platforms and I would expect the same from any video created for this challenge. But for the interest of managing the proposal we will have to set one medium as the primary one for measurement and I think YouTube is the most appropriate.

2k views to reach the minimum entry requirement may seem small, and it is, but remember this is a MINIMUM, and we would expect any video that qualifies in the Top 10 to have many more views than that. 

Here you can see how many views Nounish content is currently getting on YouTube
[![YT-V.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/XYSbwxm9/YT-V.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/bsTWP0zv)

While some content that that use gimmicks, shows a lack of creativity nor effort, or does not show a clear comprehension of what the Nouns ecosystem is may meet the minimum qualifying criteria (whether due to the creator having large existing YouTube following or otherwise), ultimately the winning pieces of content be decided upon by a Nouner vote and so are extremely unlikely to be awarded anything for their efforts. So anyone who creates a video with the expectation of success should keep it classy and keep it Nounish.

prop.description:
# Nouns AR Filters

## **TL;DR**

- Create 37 additional Augmented Reality Noun heads (increasing from 13 to 50 on Snapchat)
- Heads will be fully expressive with responsive eyes, mouth, eyebrows, and custom animations
- For the first time, bring all 50 Noun heads and 23 glasses to TikTok and Instagram

**Why?**
- AR filters can fully replace a person’s head or overlay Noggles to:
  - Record Nounish content within Snapchat, Instagram, and TikTok. 
  - Live stream as a Noun on Zoom, Discord, Twitch, etc.
  - Remix and Nounify TV and movie clips to make memes

**Compensation: 49.4 ETH**

---
## MEMES AND LIVESTREAMS
![](https://imgur.com/sSv90Sh.jpeg)
*Remixing existing footage and Nounifying it*


![](https://imgur.com/7N5B1WA.jpeg)
*Noun Square live stream*

[![](https://imgur.com/cEfJSf7.jpeg)](https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1312698913)
[*Twitch stream by Dota2 Esport Team*](https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1312698913)


![](https://imgur.com/R60fKbf.jpeg)
*On-chain proposal using the filters*


![](https://imgur.com/LeMQ1NN.jpeg)
![](https://imgur.com/PEW6XYS.jpeg)
*Simple GIFs made with [Snap AR filter noggles](https://www.snapchat.com/unlock/?type=SNAPCODE&uuid=d1507087c8f5479f89a73464805f76cb&metadata=01), see [Tenor page](https://tenor.com/users/coralorca).*

[![](https://imgur.com/dq8BsTw.jpeg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG14_cNTFqY)
*[Nouns Coffee unboxing](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG14_cNTFqY)*

---
## **VALUE PROPOSITION**

The Snap filters I created previously were used by the Dota2 Esport team (See [Grand Finals livestream](https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1312698913)), the Noun Square team (see [PropHouse winners interview](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dOP8N49QBTc)), Nounish videos (currently in production) and can be seen in some on-chain proposals and memes across Twitter and Discord. 

There is an increasing demand for Nounish content creation tools, and I often get the question: **"Wen my Noun in AR?".**

We are in the media propagation phase of Nouns, and with the expectation of AR-VR glasses becoming a main computational platform in the near future, Nouns should be AR-ready.

I propose to craft an initial set of 50 heads as expressive Augmented Reality filters, with responsive eyes, mouth, and eyebrows motion, as well as fun animations, depending on each Noun (e.g. a dripping brush, a fin flapping shark etc).

These filters will be simultaneously published on Snapchat, Instagram, and TikTok.

Nouns AR filters can be used for :
* Nounish Videos / interviews / social reels
* Live streaming / podcasts
* Undoxxed video calls
* Memes and GIFs. See my Tenor page https://tenor.com/users/coralorca
* Side proliferation on large social networks with common keywords. Get traffic by appearing on top of the "Retainer" and "Fire Hydrant" search engine for billions of users.

## **SCOPE: TIKTOK + INSTAGRAM + SNAP**

I initially received funding from NSFW to create the AR glasses on Snapchat, then won two Prophouse rounds ([round 5](https://prop.house/nouns/round-5/498) and [round 7](https://prop.house/nouns/round-7/860)) which funded 8 additional filters bringing the total on Snapchat to 13.

The frog head has been ported to TikTok and Instagram as a feasibility test.


For this proposal I will create: 


**- 50 Noun heads on TikTok with the ability to switch between the 23 glasses colors using a simple screen tap.**
Creating these requires [Effect House](https://effecthouse.tiktok.com/), TikTok’s AR filter authoring tool.
>🐸 [Try the TikTok frog head](https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMF92trdt/) 

![](https://imgur.com/2GCssla.jpeg)

###### The TikTok Frog effect has been played over 5000 times since its publication on 11/24/22 (without any marketing)

---







**- 50 Noun heads on Instagram with the ability to switch between the 23 glasses colors using a simple screen tap.**
Creating these requires [SparkAR](https://sparkar.facebook.com/ar-studio), Meta’s AR filter authoring tool.

>🐸 [Try the Instagram frog head](https://www.instagram.com/ar/667609521529085)
>Also available on [FB](https://www.facebook.com/fbcameraeffects/tryit/667609521529085/) and [Messenger video calling](https://www.messenger.com/ar/667609521529085)

![](https://imgur.com/vVXc6G7.jpeg)

###### Instagram video preview

---




**- 37 additional Noun heads on Snapchat (bringing the total published on Snapchat to 50) with the ability to switch between 23 glasses colors using a simple screen tap.** 
Creating these requires [Studio Lens](https://ar.snap.com/lens-studio), Snap's AR filter authoring tool.

Snap Lenses are particularly interesting because they:
- Integrate seamlessly with Discord, Zoom, Twitch, Google Hangout, OBS etc. using the free [Snap Camera](https://snapcamera.snapchat.com/) desktop application. See this [Youtube tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sWIZn\_-oFig) I made if you want to learn how to do it.
- Have advanced face tracking features with seamless animations

> 🐸 Try the Snap Frog head [here](https://www.snapchat.com/unlock/?type=SNAPCODE&uuid=8cbf1be819ec4a888f6917453a1d17c8&metadata=01)
🦈 Try the Snap Shark head [here](https://www.snapchat.com/unlock/?type=SNAPCODE&uuid=a1839d8ba0074f49882af6378ab63577&metadata=01)
🤖 Try the Snap Robot head [here](https://www.snapchat.com/unlock/?type=SNAPCODE&uuid=102be3194e2d49fb83d297e4b9d18103&metadata=01)
(You can use your phone and the Snapchat app or your desktop with [Snap camera](https://snapcamera.snapchat.com/))

![](https://imgur.com/M5Ybldo.jpeg)

###### Over 13 heads created on the Snapchat platform, see [creator page](https://lensstudio.snapchat.com/creator/6y\_fgP0Vr6RqaJt3jIJLRw).

---

## **PROCESS**

![](https://imgur.com/dsON2XB.jpeg)

###### Consistency across the different authoring software: Snap’s *Lens Studio*, Meta’s *SparkAR*, and TikTok’s *Effect House*.

I have been optimizing this pipeline for some time, and each trait needs custom animations depending on its shape. The geometry has to be considered individually, and some traits are more challenging than others. This is a similar process to what I went through when translating all 2D Nouns to 3D voxels with 3Dnouns.com. You can speed up the pipeline with work habits and experience, but each head requires specific attention to craft the Nounish details that make the difference.

## **METRICS**
I will share metrics from the different social platforms with the community.
Here are some metrics from the Snapchat filters created with Prophouse funding and some recently published filters on TikTok.

#### TIKTOK
![](https://imgur.com/Qdb7oSX.jpeg)
###### Close to 20k plays in two weeks with 0 marketing.

#### SNAPCHAT

![](https://imgur.com/PFoW7Ri.jpeg)

###### The Robot Noun’s head has almost 600k plays in November! This is an interesting case of side effect proliferation. 

![](https://imgur.com/T1NMuqt.jpeg)

###### BudLight was the first filter created, and currently totals over 4k plays.





## **PORTING MODELS TO INSTAGRAM AND TIKTOK**
I will import the 50 models to Meta’s and TikTok’s AR authoring software (respectively *SparkAR* and *Effect House*) to publish them to Instagram, Messenger, Facebook, and TikTok and reach a wider audience. 
Regarding the workflow, the 3D assets will be re-used, however, they still need to be imported, positioned, scaled, lit and the animation triggers need to be configured on an individual basis and depending on each software capabilities. 
From a technical standpoint Snap Lens Studio > SparkAR > TikTok Effect house. My goal is to make each Noun head as consistent as technically possible across all different platforms. See Frog head above.

## **WHICH NOUN AND WHEN**
I will deliver between 10 and 20 heads per month, released on the three platforms simultaneously as they are created. I will create community requested heads first, and otherwise will craft the traits that I think will be the most successful. 
👉Here is an open To-do if you want to add your favorite traits to the list: 
https://www.notion.so/Filters-List-1b12bdc8b51e42f4b726b650b3784f7a

![](https://imgur.com/lrjR7ac.jpeg)

###### Potential AR Filters candidates 

## **COMPENSATION**
For the Prophouse winning rounds, I suggested 4 filters for 2 ETH, when ETH was around 1800-2000 USD. The market price for such 3D AR lenses sits between 1500-5000 USD per filter. 
For reference, [this MAYC filter I created](https://www.instagram.com/ar/1025321405001469/) was commissioned by LollaPalooza for Snapchat and IG and was around 5k USD - It is a little more complex with many eyes and snot coming out of the nose.

With ETH currently around 1200 USD, I adjusted the price to 3 filters for 2 ETH, around 800 USD.

- Setting up the geometry and creating the expressions system for each of the 37 heads in Blender.
**(37/3) * 2 = 24.7**

- Porting the geometry to TikTok, Instagram, Snapchat, setting up the animation triggers and publishing to these platform with consistent tagging and video previews.
I am estimating this work at 0.18 ETH per filter for a total of 137 filters.
**(50 on TikTok + 50 on Instagram + 37 on Snapchat) * 0.18 = 24.7**

This brings the total ask at **49.4 ETH** with an average price of 0.36 ETH per filter. 

---

## **ETH ADDRESS**

0x9c74aE08Fd4337E14786f086D911E964df35e623

## **WHO I AM**

![](https://imgur.com/jmO7FHf.jpeg)

Coral Orca:
- Community member 
- Early Nouncillor
- 3D buildor: visualization with voxels, AR and VR, architecture and art. 
- [Prop 2](https://nouns.wtf/vote/2) we created [https://3dnouns.com](https://3dnouns.com/) with [0xFloyd](https://twitter.com/0xfloyd)
- [Prop 126](https://nouns.wtf/vote/126) With [John Hamon](https://twitter.com/johnhamon_)

Happy to be here, and build with my internet friends. 

Thank you for reading this proposal!

Feel free to tag me on Twitter or Discord to answer any questions. I hope this leads to more nounish content being created and more people getting exposed to the meme!

Twitter: [@coralorca](https://twitter.com/coralorca) 
Discord: `Coral Orca#4823`

prop.description:
# Prop House Mainnet

[![](https://i.imgur.com/zcJlAJu.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iJsYV5eDEX8)

*(👆 click on video for a Nouns Prop House teaser)*

---

***tl;dr:**
We’ve reached the one year mark since the inception of the idea for Prop House! Over that time period, Prop House has become a core piece of infrastructure for the development of the Nouns ecosystem – onboarding a sizable percentage of the most impactful builders while spreading the Nouns meme far and wide. We are requesting 570 ETH to continue to fund development of Prop House over the next 6 months (Jan ‘23 - Jun ‘23).*

---

***State of the Prop House(s):**
On Dec 1st, 2022, Seneca hosted an open call to update the community on what we’ve been up to since the [proposal #105](https://nouns.wtf/vote/105). You can view the [slides](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1TbJsbXWCPxbMyE25Xr_kfQjJJYMtGw0HEYuLrtdkndI/edit?usp=sharing) and recording of the talk [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qD9v1ihIRmw).*

---

## Onboarding builders
The most important outcome of Prop House for Nouns has been its ability to onboard a large percentage of the most impactful builders in the ecosystem. **More than funding, the core feature of Prop House is about activating builders**. Whether it be for folks who had never heard of Nouns before or those who were just hanging around, Prop House was the mechanism that took them from inactive to building within the ecosystem.

Given Nouns is about bottom-up brand building as opposed to top-down centralized direction, we hope that Prop House can continue to serve as a tool to execute on that Nouns vision. Below is a list of some of the builders who’ve been activated by Prop House:

![](https://i.imgur.com/2ZeeWk9.png)

## Where we are today by the numbers
Our last proposal ([#105](https://nouns.wtf/vote/105)) passed on July 18, 2022. Since then, we’ve made substantial progress on all core Prop House KPIs:

![](https://i.imgur.com/JtrkRUm.png)

All our charts are seeing sustained month-over-month growth despite market downturns:

![](https://i.imgur.com/fBw6qTd.jpg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/P5rXSsH.jpg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/4q3e9hS.jpg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/jr1bwSR.jpg)

The funnel from prop award to prop completion has maintained a high conversion rate. Close to 85% of all prop winners go on to complete their proposed work. Below is an analysis on all prop winners from all funding rounds within the [Nouns house](https://prop.house/nouns) (18 funding rounds and 105 awarded proposals):

![](https://i.imgur.com/H71CV2j.jpg)

## Spreading the Nouns meme
Over the past 5 months we’ve onboarded several communities, most notably [Meebits](https://prop.house/meebits) via [Ape Coin DAO funding](https://forum.apecoin.com/t/aip-110-meebits-prophouse-sponsored-by-apecoin/8219). By doing so, Prop House has spread the Nouns meme far beyond our immediate community. In tandem with Prop House growth comes furthering the reach of the Nouns meme along with what Nouns stands for: building.

![](https://i.imgur.com/nTQsPIo.jpg)

## Product
The Prop House team has been busy working on the core product ([prop.house](https://prop.house)). A brief summary of what we’ve done follows:

- Contracted one the best designers in the space (0xHab from Rainbow)
- Revamped UI across the entire app
- Implemented multi-round houses
- Upgraded voting UX
- Open sourced the [repository](https://github.com/Prop-House/prop-house-monorepo/).
- Released a [GraphQL interface](https://prod.backend.prop.house/graphql) for Prop House data which lead to projects like [NounsAtlas](https://nounsatlas.com), [Voters.wtf](https://voters.wtf) and [Nounish.cv](https://nounish.netlify.app/)

## Protocol
We’ve also made strides in the development of the Prop House protocol.

The protocol leverages both Ethereum and Starknet in an effort to provide the best possible user experience. This dual-chain architecture enables Prop House users to propose and vote by signing a message, while decentralizing the entire funding flow.

We use Ethereum as the operations and execution layer, where houses are managed and payouts are made, while Starknet handles all user actions that occur within a funding round.

All of the code is publicly available today in the [Prop House repository](https://github.com/Prop-House/prop-house-monorepo/tree/protocol).

Below are some of the core pieces of infrastructure we’ve developed to support the protocol, where we are currently, and what to expect as we near mainnet launch:

- The [protocol](https://github.com/Prop-House/prop-house-monorepo/tree/protocol/packages/prop-house-contracts) itself, which has been deployed to Goerli.
- The [Prop House SDK](https://github.com/Prop-House/prop-house-monorepo/tree/protocol/packages/prop-house-sdk), which simplifies interaction with the protocol (L1 & L2).
- The Starknet Relayer, which is responsible for submitting signed proposals and votes to Starknet on behalf of users.
- Ethereum & Starknet subgraphs, which are currently in development.
- Current blockers:
    - [Cairo V1 Migration](https://medium.com/starkware/open-sourcing-cairo-1-0-b3100a664bb0)
    - [Support for V1 on StarkNet](https://medium.com/starkware/starknet-regenesis-the-plan-bd0219843ef4) (expected Q1 ‘23)
    - Protocol audits (pending testing on testnet)

Assuming no major hiccups, we aim to deploy the protocol to mainnet before the end of Q1 2023.

## Financials
*The Prop House financials doc is publicly available [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iKGgedZmAzMNCFkd2PqjBd-ZgutrOjuYqfirDG1wS3g/edit?usp=sharing)*

Over the course of one year and three proposals ([#23](https://nouns.wtf/vote/23), [#62](https://nouns.wtf/vote/62), [#105](https://nouns.wtf/vote/105)), Nouns DAO has funded the Prop House team 555 ETH for deploying towards Nouns builders and 695 ETH for development and operating expenses.

![](https://i.imgur.com/oxC4c8l.png)

*Note: current burn rate for Nouns funding rounds is low (~20-30 ETH / mo). If at any point the DAO chooses to have another party deploy Nouns House Funding, we will return all remaining funds to the DAO.*

## What’s next?
### Protocol launch
We are aiming for a mainnet launch by the end of Q1 2023. What follows is the timeline we are executing against to get to launch:

- Migrate to Cairo V1
- Complete Goerli testing
- Finalize Prop House SDK & Starknet Relayer
- Launch subgraphs for Ethereum & Starknet
- Developer documentation
- Protocol audit

### Product development
Alongside the transition to the protocol as the data layer, we will continue to develop the UX of app:
- Core UX: better proposing, discovery and voting user experiences.
- The launch of house and round managers such that anyone can create a house, deposit funds and initiate funding rounds.
- Implementation for infinite rounds for grant pods to run their entire operation via Prop House.
- Develop social features for communities. 

## Sustainability
There are several avenues to explore on how to make Prop House sustainable. For the time being, we are continuing to pursue funding by Nouns DAO as we believe it to be a positive sum engagement. Below we dive into potential avenues:

### Nouns DAO funded (current)
To date, Nouns DAO has funded development costs of Prop House over the past ~12 months (695 ETH). For the current model to continue to work, Nouners would have to agree that the value created for Nouns by Prop House is higher than that of the development costs. In this framing, Nouns DAO is a patron to Prop house where its ROI is the onboarding of high impact builders, the attention generated by Prop House as public infrastructure by Nouns DAO and it being infrastructure for Nouns to run on.

### Fees for usage
The true and tried approach is turning on fees at the client and/or protocol. This approach would require a substantial increase in volume (to the order of about 50-100x) to maintain current burn rates. So while feasible, it is not a solution for the short term. 

### Experimental
**Nounish DAO**
In prop [#105](https://nouns.wtf/vote/105), we posed Prop House DAO as a plausible avenue to making Prop House sustainable. While it is still a potential route, there are concerns as to whether or not the DAO makes sense at all. At the core of it is whether the Nouns DAO format is appropriate for non-purely meme driven protocols. There’s also the question of whether every protocol needs a DAO and a corresponding governance token. So while the DAO is not out of the question, we believe that with experiments like [Nouns Builder](https://nouns.build/), the answer will become clearer over time. 
**Pure Meme NFTs**
There’s a case to be made where Prop House NFTs are minted to hold provenance value. This alone could capture long-term upside in the same way a visual artist and their collectors do. 

## Funding Request
570 ETH to fund development of Prop House protocol & client over the next 6 months (Jan ‘23 - Jun ‘23). 
- 486 ETH: 3 engineers, 1 designer and 1 all hats.
- 84 ETH for OpEx including contractors, infra, audits, bounties, translators, etc.

Funds would be received by the [Prop House team multi-sig (3/5)](https://app.safe.global/eth:0x5BcD6f3B0a5519D448FBDf33204091bbE097C992/) where the signers are Seneca, Solimander, CDT, VapeApe and Devcarrot.
